230/**
231 * Protobufs utility. Be aware that a class named org.apache.hadoop.hbase.protobuf.ProtobufUtil
232 * (i.e. no 'shaded' in the package name) carries a COPY of a subset of this class for non-shaded
233 * users; e.g. Coprocessor Endpoints. If you make change in here, be sure to make change in the
234 * companion class too (not the end of the world, especially if you are adding new functionality but
235 * something to be aware of.
236 */
237@InterfaceAudience.Private // TODO: some clients (Hive, etc) use this class
238public final class ProtobufUtil {
239
240  private static final Logger LOG = LoggerFactory.getLogger(ProtobufUtil.class.getName());
241
242  private ProtobufUtil() {
243  }
244
245  /**
246   * Many results are simple: no cell, exists true or false. To save on object creations, we reuse
247   * them across calls.
248   */
249  private final static ExtendedCell[] EMPTY_CELL_ARRAY = new ExtendedCell[0];
250  private final static Result EMPTY_RESULT = Result.create(EMPTY_CELL_ARRAY);
251  final static Result EMPTY_RESULT_EXISTS_TRUE = Result.create(null, true);
252  final static Result EMPTY_RESULT_EXISTS_FALSE = Result.create(null, false);
253  private final static Result EMPTY_RESULT_STALE = Result.create(EMPTY_CELL_ARRAY, null, true);
254  private final static Result EMPTY_RESULT_EXISTS_TRUE_STALE =
255    Result.create((Cell[]) null, true, true);
256  private final static Result EMPTY_RESULT_EXISTS_FALSE_STALE =
257    Result.create((Cell[]) null, false, true);
258
259  private final static ClientProtos.Result EMPTY_RESULT_PB;
260  private final static ClientProtos.Result EMPTY_RESULT_PB_EXISTS_TRUE;
261  private final static ClientProtos.Result EMPTY_RESULT_PB_EXISTS_FALSE;
262  private final static ClientProtos.Result EMPTY_RESULT_PB_STALE;
263  private final static ClientProtos.Result EMPTY_RESULT_PB_EXISTS_TRUE_STALE;
264  private final static ClientProtos.Result EMPTY_RESULT_PB_EXISTS_FALSE_STALE;
265
266  static {
267    ClientProtos.Result.Builder builder = ClientProtos.Result.newBuilder();
268
269    builder.setExists(true);
270    builder.setAssociatedCellCount(0);
271    EMPTY_RESULT_PB_EXISTS_TRUE = builder.build();
272
273    builder.setStale(true);
274    EMPTY_RESULT_PB_EXISTS_TRUE_STALE = builder.build();
275    builder.clear();
276
277    builder.setExists(false);
278    builder.setAssociatedCellCount(0);
279    EMPTY_RESULT_PB_EXISTS_FALSE = builder.build();
280    builder.setStale(true);
281    EMPTY_RESULT_PB_EXISTS_FALSE_STALE = builder.build();
282
283    builder.clear();
284    builder.setAssociatedCellCount(0);
285    EMPTY_RESULT_PB = builder.build();
286    builder.setStale(true);
287    EMPTY_RESULT_PB_STALE = builder.build();
288  }
289
290  private static volatile boolean classLoaderLoaded = false;
291
292  /**
293   * Dynamic class loader to load filter/comparators
294   */
295  private final static class ClassLoaderHolder {
296    private final static ClassLoader CLASS_LOADER;
297
298    static {
299      ClassLoader parent = ProtobufUtil.class.getClassLoader();
300      Configuration conf = HBaseConfiguration.create();
301      CLASS_LOADER = AccessController
302        .doPrivileged((PrivilegedAction<ClassLoader>) () -> new DynamicClassLoader(conf, parent));
303      classLoaderLoaded = true;
304    }
305  }
306
307  public static boolean isClassLoaderLoaded() {
308    return classLoaderLoaded;
309  }
310
311  private static final String PARSE_FROM = "parseFrom";
312
313  // We don't bother using the dynamic CLASS_LOADER above, because currently we can't support
314  // optimizing dynamically loaded classes. We can do it once we build for java9+, see the todo
315  // in ReflectedFunctionCache
316  private static final ReflectedFunctionCache<byte[], Filter> FILTERS =
317    new ReflectedFunctionCache<>(Filter.class, byte[].class, PARSE_FROM);
318  private static final ReflectedFunctionCache<byte[], ByteArrayComparable> COMPARATORS =
319    new ReflectedFunctionCache<>(ByteArrayComparable.class, byte[].class, PARSE_FROM);
320
321  private static volatile boolean ALLOW_FAST_REFLECTION_FALLTHROUGH = true;
322
323  // Visible for tests
324  public static void setAllowFastReflectionFallthrough(boolean val) {
325    ALLOW_FAST_REFLECTION_FALLTHROUGH = val;
326  }
327
328  /**
329   * Prepend the passed bytes with four bytes of magic, {@link ProtobufMagic#PB_MAGIC}, to flag what
330   * follows as a protobuf in hbase. Prepend these bytes to all content written to znodes, etc.
331   * @param bytes Bytes to decorate
332   * @return The passed <code>bytes</code> with magic prepended (Creates a new byte array that is
333   *         <code>bytes.length</code> plus {@link ProtobufMagic#PB_MAGIC}.length.
334   */
335  public static byte[] prependPBMagic(final byte[] bytes) {
336    return Bytes.add(PB_MAGIC, bytes);
337  }
338
339  /** Returns True if passed <code>bytes</code> has {@link ProtobufMagic#PB_MAGIC} for a prefix. */
340  public static boolean isPBMagicPrefix(final byte[] bytes) {
341    return ProtobufMagic.isPBMagicPrefix(bytes);
342  }
343
344  /** Returns True if passed <code>bytes</code> has {@link ProtobufMagic#PB_MAGIC} for a prefix. */
345  public static boolean isPBMagicPrefix(final byte[] bytes, int offset, int len) {
346    return ProtobufMagic.isPBMagicPrefix(bytes, offset, len);
347  }
348
349  /**
350   * Expect the {@link ProtobufMagic#PB_MAGIC} or throw an exception.
351   * @param bytes bytes to check
352   * @throws DeserializationException if we are missing the pb magic prefix
353   */
354  public static void expectPBMagicPrefix(final byte[] bytes) throws DeserializationException {
355    if (!isPBMagicPrefix(bytes)) {
356      String bytesPrefix = bytes == null ? "null" : Bytes.toStringBinary(bytes, 0, PB_MAGIC.length);
357      throw new DeserializationException(
358        "Missing pb magic " + Bytes.toString(PB_MAGIC) + " prefix" + ", bytes: " + bytesPrefix);
359    }
360  }
361
362  /** Returns Length of {@link ProtobufMagic#lengthOfPBMagic()} */
363  public static int lengthOfPBMagic() {
364    return ProtobufMagic.lengthOfPBMagic();
365  }
366
367  public static ComparatorProtos.ByteArrayComparable toByteArrayComparable(final byte[] value) {
368    ComparatorProtos.ByteArrayComparable.Builder builder =
369      ComparatorProtos.ByteArrayComparable.newBuilder();
370    if (value != null) builder.setValue(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(value));
371    return builder.build();
372  }
373
374  /**
375   * Return the IOException thrown by the remote server wrapped in ServiceException as cause.
376   * @param se ServiceException that wraps IO exception thrown by the server
377   * @return Exception wrapped in ServiceException or a new IOException that wraps the unexpected
378   *         ServiceException.
379   */
380  public static IOException getRemoteException(ServiceException se) {
381    return makeIOExceptionOfException(se);
382  }
383
384  /**
385   * Like {@link #getRemoteException(ServiceException)} but more generic, able to handle more than
386   * just {@link ServiceException}. Prefer this method to
387   * {@link #getRemoteException(ServiceException)} because trying to contain direct protobuf
388   * references.
389   */
390  public static IOException handleRemoteException(Throwable e) {
391    return makeIOExceptionOfException(e);
392  }
393
394  private static IOException makeIOExceptionOfException(Throwable e) {
395    Throwable t = e;
396    if (e instanceof ServiceException) {
397      t = e.getCause();
398    }
399    if (ExceptionUtil.isInterrupt(t)) {
400      return ExceptionUtil.asInterrupt(t);
401    }
402    if (t instanceof RemoteException) {
403      t = ((RemoteException) t).unwrapRemoteException();
404    }
405    return t instanceof IOException ? (IOException) t : new HBaseIOException(t);
406  }
407
408  /**
409   * Convert a ServerName to a protocol buffer ServerName
410   * @param serverName the ServerName to convert
411   * @return the converted protocol buffer ServerName
412   * @see #toServerName(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.shaded.protobuf.generated.HBaseProtos.ServerName)
413   */
414  public static HBaseProtos.ServerName toServerName(final ServerName serverName) {
415    if (serverName == null) {
416      return null;
417    }
418    HBaseProtos.ServerName.Builder builder = HBaseProtos.ServerName.newBuilder();
419    builder.setHostName(serverName.getHostname());
420    if (serverName.getPort() >= 0) {
421      builder.setPort(serverName.getPort());
422    }
423    if (serverName.getStartcode() >= 0) {
424      builder.setStartCode(serverName.getStartcode());
425    }
426    return builder.build();
427  }
428
429  /**
430   * Convert a protocol buffer ServerName to a ServerName
431   * @param proto the protocol buffer ServerName to convert
432   * @return the converted ServerName
433   */
434  public static ServerName toServerName(final HBaseProtos.ServerName proto) {
435    if (proto == null) return null;
436    String hostName = proto.getHostName();
437    long startCode = -1;
438    int port = -1;
439    if (proto.hasPort()) {
440      port = proto.getPort();
441    }
442    if (proto.hasStartCode()) {
443      startCode = proto.getStartCode();
444    }
445    return ServerName.valueOf(hostName, port, startCode);
446  }
447
448  /**
449   * Get a ServerName from the passed in data bytes.
450   * @param data Data with a serialize server name in it; can handle the old style servername where
451   *             servername was host and port. Works too with data that begins w/ the pb 'PBUF'
452   *             magic and that is then followed by a protobuf that has a serialized
453   *             {@link ServerName} in it.
454   * @return Returns null if <code>data</code> is null else converts passed data to a ServerName
455   *         instance.
456   */
457  public static ServerName toServerName(final byte[] data) throws DeserializationException {
458    if (data == null || data.length <= 0) {
459      return null;
460    }
461    if (ProtobufMagic.isPBMagicPrefix(data)) {
462      int prefixLen = ProtobufMagic.lengthOfPBMagic();
463      try {
464        ZooKeeperProtos.Master rss =
465          ZooKeeperProtos.Master.parser().parseFrom(data, prefixLen, data.length - prefixLen);
466        HBaseProtos.ServerName sn = rss.getMaster();
467        return ServerName.valueOf(sn.getHostName(), sn.getPort(), sn.getStartCode());
468      } catch (/* InvalidProtocolBufferException */IOException e) {
469        // A failed parse of the znode is pretty catastrophic. Rather than loop
470        // retrying hoping the bad bytes will changes, and rather than change
471        // the signature on this method to add an IOE which will send ripples all
472        // over the code base, throw a RuntimeException. This should "never" happen.
473        // Fail fast if it does.
474        throw new DeserializationException(e);
475      }
476    }
477    // The str returned could be old style -- pre hbase-1502 -- which was
478    // hostname and port seperated by a colon rather than hostname, port and
479    // startcode delimited by a ','.
480    String str = Bytes.toString(data);
481    int index = str.indexOf(ServerName.SERVERNAME_SEPARATOR);
482    if (index != -1) {
483      // Presume its ServerName serialized with versioned bytes.
484      return ServerName.parseVersionedServerName(data);
485    }
486    // Presume it a hostname:port format.
487    String hostname = Addressing.parseHostname(str);
488    int port = Addressing.parsePort(str);
489    return ServerName.valueOf(hostname, port, -1L);
490  }
491
492  /**
493   * Convert a list of protocol buffer ServerName to a list of ServerName
494   * @param proto protocol buffer ServerNameList
495   * @return a list of ServerName
496   */
497  public static List<ServerName> toServerNameList(List<HBaseProtos.ServerName> proto) {
498    return proto.stream().map(ProtobufUtil::toServerName).collect(Collectors.toList());
499  }

501  /**
502   * Get a list of NamespaceDescriptor from ListNamespaceDescriptorsResponse protobuf
503   * @param proto the ListNamespaceDescriptorsResponse
504   * @return a list of NamespaceDescriptor
505   */
506  public static List<NamespaceDescriptor>
507    toNamespaceDescriptorList(ListNamespaceDescriptorsResponse proto) {
508    return proto.getNamespaceDescriptorList().stream().map(ProtobufUtil::toNamespaceDescriptor)
509      .collect(Collectors.toList());
510  }

512  /**
513   * Get a list of TableDescriptor from GetTableDescriptorsResponse protobuf
514   * @param proto the GetTableDescriptorsResponse
515   * @return a list of TableDescriptor
516   */
517  public static List<TableDescriptor> toTableDescriptorList(GetTableDescriptorsResponse proto) {
518    if (proto == null) {
519      return new ArrayList<>();
520    }
521    return proto.getTableSchemaList().stream().map(ProtobufUtil::toTableDescriptor)
522      .collect(Collectors.toList());
523  }

528   * @return a list of TableDescriptor
529   */
530  public static List<TableDescriptor>
531    toTableDescriptorList(ListTableDescriptorsByNamespaceResponse proto) {
532    if (proto == null) return new ArrayList<>();
533    return proto.getTableSchemaList().stream().map(ProtobufUtil::toTableDescriptor)
534      .collect(Collectors.toList());
535  }

538   * Get a list of TableDescriptor from ListTableDescriptorsByNamespaceResponse protobuf
539   * @param proto the ListTableDescriptorsByNamespaceResponse
540   * @return a list of TableDescriptor
541   */
542  public static List<TableDescriptor>
543    toTableDescriptorList(ListTableDescriptorsByStateResponse proto) {
544    if (proto == null) return new ArrayList<>();
545    return proto.getTableSchemaList().stream().map(ProtobufUtil::toTableDescriptor)
546      .collect(Collectors.toList());

549  /**
550   * get the split keys in form "byte [][]" from a CreateTableRequest proto
551   * @param proto the CreateTableRequest
552   * @return the split keys
553   */
554  public static byte[][] getSplitKeysArray(final CreateTableRequest proto) {
555    byte[][] splitKeys = new byte[proto.getSplitKeysCount()][];
556    for (int i = 0; i < proto.getSplitKeysCount(); ++i) {
557      splitKeys[i] = proto.getSplitKeys(i).toByteArray();
558    }
559    return splitKeys;
560  }
561
562  /**
563   * Convert a protobuf Durability into a client Durability
564   */
565  public static Durability toDurability(final ClientProtos.MutationProto.Durability proto) {
566    switch (proto) {
567      case USE_DEFAULT:
568        return Durability.USE_DEFAULT;
569      case SKIP_WAL:
570        return Durability.SKIP_WAL;
571      case ASYNC_WAL:
572        return Durability.ASYNC_WAL;
573      case SYNC_WAL:
574        return Durability.SYNC_WAL;
575      case FSYNC_WAL:
576        return Durability.FSYNC_WAL;
577      default:
578        return Durability.USE_DEFAULT;
579    }
580  }
581
582  /**
583   * Convert a client Durability into a protbuf Durability
584   */
585  public static ClientProtos.MutationProto.Durability toDurability(final Durability d) {
586    switch (d) {
587      case USE_DEFAULT:
588        return ClientProtos.MutationProto.Durability.USE_DEFAULT;
589      case SKIP_WAL:
590        return ClientProtos.MutationProto.Durability.SKIP_WAL;
591      case ASYNC_WAL:
592        return ClientProtos.MutationProto.Durability.ASYNC_WAL;
593      case SYNC_WAL:
594        return ClientProtos.MutationProto.Durability.SYNC_WAL;
595      case FSYNC_WAL:
596        return ClientProtos.MutationProto.Durability.FSYNC_WAL;
597      default:
598        return ClientProtos.MutationProto.Durability.USE_DEFAULT;
599    }
600  }
601
602  /**
603   * Convert a protocol buffer Get to a client Get
604   * @param proto the protocol buffer Get to convert
605   * @return the converted client Get
606   */
607  public static Get toGet(final ClientProtos.Get proto) throws IOException {
608    if (proto == null) return null;
609    byte[] row = proto.getRow().toByteArray();
610    Get get = new Get(row);
611    if (proto.hasCacheBlocks()) {
612      get.setCacheBlocks(proto.getCacheBlocks());
613    }
614    if (proto.hasMaxVersions()) {
615      get.readVersions(proto.getMaxVersions());
616    }
617    if (proto.hasStoreLimit()) {
618      get.setMaxResultsPerColumnFamily(proto.getStoreLimit());
619    }
620    if (proto.hasStoreOffset()) {
621      get.setRowOffsetPerColumnFamily(proto.getStoreOffset());
622    }
623    if (proto.getCfTimeRangeCount() > 0) {
624      for (HBaseProtos.ColumnFamilyTimeRange cftr : proto.getCfTimeRangeList()) {
625        TimeRange timeRange = toTimeRange(cftr.getTimeRange());
626        get.setColumnFamilyTimeRange(cftr.getColumnFamily().toByteArray(), timeRange.getMin(),
627          timeRange.getMax());
628      }
629    }
630    if (proto.hasTimeRange()) {
631      TimeRange timeRange = toTimeRange(proto.getTimeRange());
632      get.setTimeRange(timeRange.getMin(), timeRange.getMax());
633    }
634    if (proto.hasFilter()) {
635      FilterProtos.Filter filter = proto.getFilter();
636      get.setFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(filter));
637    }
638    for (NameBytesPair attribute : proto.getAttributeList()) {
639      get.setAttribute(attribute.getName(), attribute.getValue().toByteArray());
640    }
641    if (proto.getColumnCount() > 0) {
642      for (Column column : proto.getColumnList()) {
643        byte[] family = column.getFamily().toByteArray();
644        if (column.getQualifierCount() > 0) {
645          for (ByteString qualifier : column.getQualifierList()) {
646            get.addColumn(family, qualifier.toByteArray());
647          }
648        } else {
649          get.addFamily(family);
650        }
651      }
652    }
653    if (proto.hasExistenceOnly() && proto.getExistenceOnly()) {
654      get.setCheckExistenceOnly(true);
655    }
656    if (proto.hasConsistency()) {
657      get.setConsistency(toConsistency(proto.getConsistency()));
658    }
659    if (proto.hasLoadColumnFamiliesOnDemand()) {
660      get.setLoadColumnFamiliesOnDemand(proto.getLoadColumnFamiliesOnDemand());
661    }
662    return get;
663  }
664
665  public static Consistency toConsistency(ClientProtos.Consistency consistency) {
666    switch (consistency) {
667      case STRONG:
668        return Consistency.STRONG;
669      case TIMELINE:
670        return Consistency.TIMELINE;
671      default:
672        return Consistency.STRONG;
673    }
674  }
675
676  public static ClientProtos.Consistency toConsistency(Consistency consistency) {
677    switch (consistency) {
678      case STRONG:
679        return ClientProtos.Consistency.STRONG;
680      case TIMELINE:
681        return ClientProtos.Consistency.TIMELINE;
682      default:
683        return ClientProtos.Consistency.STRONG;
684    }
685  }
686
687  /**
688   * Convert a protocol buffer Mutate to a Put.
689   * @param proto The protocol buffer MutationProto to convert
690   * @return A client Put.
691   */
692  public static Put toPut(final MutationProto proto) throws IOException {
693    return toPut(proto, null);
694  }
695
696  /**
697   * Convert a protocol buffer Mutate to a Put.
698   * @param proto       The protocol buffer MutationProto to convert
699   * @param cellScanner If non-null, the Cell data that goes with this proto.
700   * @return A client Put.
701   */
702  public static Put toPut(final MutationProto proto, final CellScanner cellScanner)
703    throws IOException {
704    // TODO: Server-side at least why do we convert back to the Client types? Why not just pb it?
705    MutationType type = proto.getMutateType();
706    assert type == MutationType.PUT : type.name();
707    long timestamp = proto.hasTimestamp() ? proto.getTimestamp() : HConstants.LATEST_TIMESTAMP;
708    Put put = proto.hasRow() ? new Put(proto.getRow().toByteArray(), timestamp) : null;
709    int cellCount = proto.hasAssociatedCellCount() ? proto.getAssociatedCellCount() : 0;
710    if (cellCount > 0) {
711      // The proto has metadata only and the data is separate to be found in the cellScanner.
712      if (cellScanner == null) {
713        throw new DoNotRetryIOException(
714          "Cell count of " + cellCount + " but no cellScanner: " + toShortString(proto));
715      }
716      for (int i = 0; i < cellCount; i++) {
717        if (!cellScanner.advance()) {
718          throw new DoNotRetryIOException("Cell count of " + cellCount + " but at index " + i
719            + " no cell returned: " + toShortString(proto));
720        }
721        Cell cell = cellScanner.current();
722        if (put == null) {
723          put = new Put(cell.getRowArray(), cell.getRowOffset(), cell.getRowLength(), timestamp);
724        }
725        put.add(cell);
726      }
727    } else {
728      if (put == null) {
729        throw new IllegalArgumentException("row cannot be null");
730      }
731      // The proto has the metadata and the data itself
732      ExtendedCellBuilder cellBuilder =
733        ExtendedCellBuilderFactory.create(CellBuilderType.SHALLOW_COPY);
734      for (ColumnValue column : proto.getColumnValueList()) {
735        byte[] family = column.getFamily().toByteArray();
736        for (QualifierValue qv : column.getQualifierValueList()) {
737          if (!qv.hasValue()) {
738            throw new DoNotRetryIOException("Missing required field: qualifier value");
739          }
740          long ts = timestamp;
741          if (qv.hasTimestamp()) {
742            ts = qv.getTimestamp();
743          }
744          byte[] allTagsBytes;
745          if (qv.hasTags()) {
746            allTagsBytes = qv.getTags().toByteArray();
747            if (qv.hasDeleteType()) {
748              put.add(cellBuilder.clear().setRow(proto.getRow().toByteArray()).setFamily(family)
749                .setQualifier(qv.hasQualifier() ? qv.getQualifier().toByteArray() : null)
750                .setTimestamp(ts).setType(fromDeleteType(qv.getDeleteType()).getCode())
751                .setTags(allTagsBytes).build());
752            } else {
753              put.add(cellBuilder.clear().setRow(put.getRow()).setFamily(family)
754                .setQualifier(qv.hasQualifier() ? qv.getQualifier().toByteArray() : null)
755                .setTimestamp(ts).setType(Cell.Type.Put)
756                .setValue(qv.hasValue() ? qv.getValue().toByteArray() : null).setTags(allTagsBytes)
757                .build());
758            }
759          } else {
760            if (qv.hasDeleteType()) {
761              put.add(cellBuilder.clear().setRow(put.getRow()).setFamily(family)
762                .setQualifier(qv.hasQualifier() ? qv.getQualifier().toByteArray() : null)
763                .setTimestamp(ts).setType(fromDeleteType(qv.getDeleteType()).getCode()).build());
764            } else {
765              put.add(cellBuilder.clear().setRow(put.getRow()).setFamily(family)
766                .setQualifier(qv.hasQualifier() ? qv.getQualifier().toByteArray() : null)
767                .setTimestamp(ts).setType(Cell.Type.Put)
768                .setValue(qv.hasValue() ? qv.getValue().toByteArray() : null).build());
769            }
770          }
771        }
772      }
773    }
774    put.setDurability(toDurability(proto.getDurability()));
775    for (NameBytesPair attribute : proto.getAttributeList()) {
776      put.setAttribute(attribute.getName(), attribute.getValue().toByteArray());
777    }
778    return put;
779  }
780
781  /**
782   * Convert a protocol buffer Mutate to a Delete
783   * @param proto the protocol buffer Mutate to convert
784   * @return the converted client Delete
785   */
786  public static Delete toDelete(final MutationProto proto) throws IOException {
787    return toDelete(proto, null);
788  }
789
790  /**
791   * Convert a protocol buffer Mutate to a Delete
792   * @param proto       the protocol buffer Mutate to convert
793   * @param cellScanner if non-null, the data that goes with this delete.
794   * @return the converted client Delete
795   */
796  public static Delete toDelete(final MutationProto proto, final CellScanner cellScanner)
797    throws IOException {
798    MutationType type = proto.getMutateType();
799    assert type == MutationType.DELETE : type.name();
800    long timestamp = proto.hasTimestamp() ? proto.getTimestamp() : HConstants.LATEST_TIMESTAMP;
801    Delete delete = proto.hasRow() ? new Delete(proto.getRow().toByteArray(), timestamp) : null;
802    int cellCount = proto.hasAssociatedCellCount() ? proto.getAssociatedCellCount() : 0;
803    if (cellCount > 0) {
804      // The proto has metadata only and the data is separate to be found in the cellScanner.
805      if (cellScanner == null) {
806        // TextFormat should be fine for a Delete since it carries no data, just coordinates.
807        throw new DoNotRetryIOException("Cell count of " + cellCount + " but no cellScanner: "
808          + TextFormat.shortDebugString(proto));
809      }
810      for (int i = 0; i < cellCount; i++) {
811        if (!cellScanner.advance()) {
812          // TextFormat should be fine for a Delete since it carries no data, just coordinates.
813          throw new DoNotRetryIOException("Cell count of " + cellCount + " but at index " + i
814            + " no cell returned: " + TextFormat.shortDebugString(proto));
815        }
816        Cell cell = cellScanner.current();
817        if (delete == null) {
818          delete =
819            new Delete(cell.getRowArray(), cell.getRowOffset(), cell.getRowLength(), timestamp);
820        }
821        delete.add(cell);
822      }
823    } else {
824      if (delete == null) {
825        throw new IllegalArgumentException("row cannot be null");
826      }
827      for (ColumnValue column : proto.getColumnValueList()) {
828        byte[] family = column.getFamily().toByteArray();
829        for (QualifierValue qv : column.getQualifierValueList()) {
830          DeleteType deleteType = qv.getDeleteType();
831          byte[] qualifier = null;
832          if (qv.hasQualifier()) {
833            qualifier = qv.getQualifier().toByteArray();
834          }
835          long ts = cellTimestampOrLatest(qv);
836          if (deleteType == DeleteType.DELETE_ONE_VERSION) {
837            delete.addColumn(family, qualifier, ts);
838          } else if (deleteType == DeleteType.DELETE_MULTIPLE_VERSIONS) {
839            delete.addColumns(family, qualifier, ts);
840          } else if (deleteType == DeleteType.DELETE_FAMILY_VERSION) {
841            delete.addFamilyVersion(family, ts);
842          } else {
843            delete.addFamily(family, ts);
844          }
845        }
846      }
847    }
848    delete.setDurability(toDurability(proto.getDurability()));
849    for (NameBytesPair attribute : proto.getAttributeList()) {
850      delete.setAttribute(attribute.getName(), attribute.getValue().toByteArray());
851    }
852    return delete;
853  }
854
855  @FunctionalInterface
856  private interface ConsumerWithException<T, U> {
857    void accept(T t, U u) throws IOException;
858  }
859
860  private static <T extends Mutation> T toDelta(Function<Bytes, T> supplier,
861    ConsumerWithException<T, Cell> consumer, final MutationProto proto,
862    final CellScanner cellScanner) throws IOException {
863    byte[] row = proto.hasRow() ? proto.getRow().toByteArray() : null;
864    T mutation = row == null ? null : supplier.apply(new Bytes(row));
865    int cellCount = proto.hasAssociatedCellCount() ? proto.getAssociatedCellCount() : 0;
866    if (cellCount > 0) {
867      // The proto has metadata only and the data is separate to be found in the cellScanner.
868      if (cellScanner == null) {
869        throw new DoNotRetryIOException(
870          "Cell count of " + cellCount + " but no cellScanner: " + toShortString(proto));
871      }
872      for (int i = 0; i < cellCount; i++) {
873        if (!cellScanner.advance()) {
874          throw new DoNotRetryIOException("Cell count of " + cellCount + " but at index " + i
875            + " no cell returned: " + toShortString(proto));
876        }
877        Cell cell = cellScanner.current();
878        if (mutation == null) {
879          mutation =
880            supplier.apply(new Bytes(cell.getRowArray(), cell.getRowOffset(), cell.getRowLength()));
881        }
882        consumer.accept(mutation, cell);
883      }
884    } else {
885      if (mutation == null) {
886        throw new IllegalArgumentException("row cannot be null");
887      }
888      for (ColumnValue column : proto.getColumnValueList()) {
889        byte[] family = column.getFamily().toByteArray();
890        for (QualifierValue qv : column.getQualifierValueList()) {
891          byte[] qualifier = qv.getQualifier().toByteArray();
892          if (!qv.hasValue()) {
893            throw new DoNotRetryIOException("Missing required field: qualifier value");
894          }
895          byte[] value = qv.getValue().toByteArray();
896          byte[] tags = null;
897          if (qv.hasTags()) {
898            tags = qv.getTags().toByteArray();
899          }
900          consumer.accept(mutation,
901            ExtendedCellBuilderFactory.create(CellBuilderType.SHALLOW_COPY)
902              .setRow(mutation.getRow()).setFamily(family).setQualifier(qualifier)
903              .setTimestamp(cellTimestampOrLatest(qv)).setType(KeyValue.Type.Put.getCode())
904              .setValue(value).setTags(tags).build());
905        }
906      }
907    }
908    mutation.setDurability(toDurability(proto.getDurability()));
909    for (NameBytesPair attribute : proto.getAttributeList()) {
910      mutation.setAttribute(attribute.getName(), attribute.getValue().toByteArray());
911    }
912    return mutation;
913  }
914
915  private static long cellTimestampOrLatest(QualifierValue cell) {
916    if (cell.hasTimestamp()) {
917      return cell.getTimestamp();
918    } else {
919      return HConstants.LATEST_TIMESTAMP;
920    }
921  }
922
923  /**
924   * Convert a protocol buffer Mutate to an Append
925   * @param proto the protocol buffer Mutate to convert
926   * @return the converted client Append
927   */
928  public static Append toAppend(final MutationProto proto, final CellScanner cellScanner)
929    throws IOException {
930    MutationType type = proto.getMutateType();
931    assert type == MutationType.APPEND : type.name();
932    Append append = toDelta((Bytes row) -> new Append(row.get(), row.getOffset(), row.getLength()),
933      Append::add, proto, cellScanner);
934    if (proto.hasTimeRange()) {
935      TimeRange timeRange = toTimeRange(proto.getTimeRange());
936      append.setTimeRange(timeRange.getMin(), timeRange.getMax());
937    }
938    return append;
939  }
940
941  /**
942   * Convert a protocol buffer Mutate to an Increment
943   * @param proto the protocol buffer Mutate to convert
944   * @return the converted client Increment
945   */
946  public static Increment toIncrement(final MutationProto proto, final CellScanner cellScanner)
947    throws IOException {
948    MutationType type = proto.getMutateType();
949    assert type == MutationType.INCREMENT : type.name();
950    Increment increment =
951      toDelta((Bytes row) -> new Increment(row.get(), row.getOffset(), row.getLength()),
952        Increment::add, proto, cellScanner);
953    if (proto.hasTimeRange()) {
954      TimeRange timeRange = toTimeRange(proto.getTimeRange());
955      increment.setTimeRange(timeRange.getMin(), timeRange.getMax());
956    }
957    return increment;
958  }
959
960  /**
961   * Convert a MutateRequest to Mutation
962   * @param proto the protocol buffer Mutate to convert
963   * @return the converted Mutation
964   */
965  public static Mutation toMutation(final MutationProto proto) throws IOException {
966    MutationType type = proto.getMutateType();
967    if (type == MutationType.INCREMENT) {
968      return toIncrement(proto, null);
969    }
970    if (type == MutationType.APPEND) {
971      return toAppend(proto, null);
972    }
973    if (type == MutationType.DELETE) {
974      return toDelete(proto, null);
975    }
976    if (type == MutationType.PUT) {
977      return toPut(proto, null);
978    }
979    throw new IOException("Unknown mutation type " + type);
980  }
981
982  public static ClientProtos.Scan.ReadType toReadType(Scan.ReadType readType) {
983    switch (readType) {
984      case DEFAULT:
985        return ClientProtos.Scan.ReadType.DEFAULT;
986      case STREAM:
987        return ClientProtos.Scan.ReadType.STREAM;
988      case PREAD:
989        return ClientProtos.Scan.ReadType.PREAD;
990      default:
991        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unknown ReadType: " + readType);
992    }
993  }
994
995  public static Scan.ReadType toReadType(ClientProtos.Scan.ReadType readType) {
996    switch (readType) {
997      case DEFAULT:
998        return Scan.ReadType.DEFAULT;
999      case STREAM:
1000        return Scan.ReadType.STREAM;
1001      case PREAD:
1002        return Scan.ReadType.PREAD;
1003      default:
1004        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unknown ReadType: " + readType);
1005    }
1006  }
1007
1008  /**
1009   * Convert a client Scan to a protocol buffer Scan
1010   * @param scan the client Scan to convert
1011   * @return the converted protocol buffer Scan
1012   */
1013  public static ClientProtos.Scan toScan(final Scan scan) throws IOException {
1014    ClientProtos.Scan.Builder scanBuilder = ClientProtos.Scan.newBuilder();
1015    scanBuilder.setCacheBlocks(scan.getCacheBlocks());
1016    if (scan.getBatch() > 0) {
1017      scanBuilder.setBatchSize(scan.getBatch());
1018    }
1019    if (scan.getMaxResultSize() > 0) {
1020      scanBuilder.setMaxResultSize(scan.getMaxResultSize());
1021    }
1022    if (scan.getAllowPartialResults()) {
1023      scanBuilder.setAllowPartialResults(scan.getAllowPartialResults());
1024    }
1025    Boolean loadColumnFamiliesOnDemand = scan.getLoadColumnFamiliesOnDemandValue();
1026    if (loadColumnFamiliesOnDemand != null) {
1027      scanBuilder.setLoadColumnFamiliesOnDemand(loadColumnFamiliesOnDemand);
1028    }
1029    scanBuilder.setMaxVersions(scan.getMaxVersions());
1030    scan.getColumnFamilyTimeRange().forEach((cf, timeRange) -> {
1031      scanBuilder.addCfTimeRange(HBaseProtos.ColumnFamilyTimeRange.newBuilder()
1032        .setColumnFamily(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(cf)).setTimeRange(toTimeRange(timeRange))
1033        .build());
1034    });
1035    scanBuilder.setTimeRange(ProtobufUtil.toTimeRange(scan.getTimeRange()));
1036    Map<String, byte[]> attributes = scan.getAttributesMap();
1037    if (!attributes.isEmpty()) {
1038      NameBytesPair.Builder attributeBuilder = NameBytesPair.newBuilder();
1039      for (Map.Entry<String, byte[]> attribute : attributes.entrySet()) {
1040        attributeBuilder.setName(attribute.getKey());
1041        attributeBuilder.setValue(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(attribute.getValue()));
1042        scanBuilder.addAttribute(attributeBuilder.build());
1043      }
1044    }
1045    byte[] startRow = scan.getStartRow();
1046    if (startRow != null && startRow.length > 0) {
1047      scanBuilder.setStartRow(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(startRow));
1048    }
1049    byte[] stopRow = scan.getStopRow();
1050    if (stopRow != null && stopRow.length > 0) {
1051      scanBuilder.setStopRow(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(stopRow));
1052    }
1053    if (scan.hasFilter()) {
1054      scanBuilder.setFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(scan.getFilter()));
1055    }
1056    if (scan.hasFamilies()) {
1057      Column.Builder columnBuilder = Column.newBuilder();
1058      for (Map.Entry<byte[], NavigableSet<byte[]>> family : scan.getFamilyMap().entrySet()) {
1059        columnBuilder.setFamily(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(family.getKey()));
1060        NavigableSet<byte[]> qualifiers = family.getValue();
1061        columnBuilder.clearQualifier();
1062        if (qualifiers != null && qualifiers.size() > 0) {
1063          for (byte[] qualifier : qualifiers) {
1064            columnBuilder.addQualifier(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(qualifier));
1065          }
1066        }
1067        scanBuilder.addColumn(columnBuilder.build());
1068      }
1069    }
1070    if (scan.getMaxResultsPerColumnFamily() >= 0) {
1071      scanBuilder.setStoreLimit(scan.getMaxResultsPerColumnFamily());
1072    }
1073    if (scan.getRowOffsetPerColumnFamily() > 0) {
1074      scanBuilder.setStoreOffset(scan.getRowOffsetPerColumnFamily());
1075    }
1076    if (scan.isReversed()) {
1077      scanBuilder.setReversed(scan.isReversed());
1078    }
1079    if (scan.getConsistency() == Consistency.TIMELINE) {
1080      scanBuilder.setConsistency(toConsistency(scan.getConsistency()));
1081    }
1082    if (scan.getCaching() > 0) {
1083      scanBuilder.setCaching(scan.getCaching());
1084    }
1085    long mvccReadPoint = ClientInternalHelper.getMvccReadPoint(scan);
1086    if (mvccReadPoint > 0) {
1087      scanBuilder.setMvccReadPoint(mvccReadPoint);
1088    }
1089    if (!scan.includeStartRow()) {
1090      scanBuilder.setIncludeStartRow(false);
1091    }
1092    scanBuilder.setIncludeStopRow(scan.includeStopRow());
1093    if (scan.getReadType() != Scan.ReadType.DEFAULT) {
1094      scanBuilder.setReadType(toReadType(scan.getReadType()));
1095    }
1096    if (scan.isNeedCursorResult()) {
1097      scanBuilder.setNeedCursorResult(true);
1098    }
1099    return scanBuilder.build();
1100  }
1101
1102  /**
1103   * Convert a protocol buffer Scan to a client Scan
1104   * @param proto the protocol buffer Scan to convert
1105   * @return the converted client Scan
1106   */
1107  public static Scan toScan(final ClientProtos.Scan proto) throws IOException {
1108    byte[] startRow = HConstants.EMPTY_START_ROW;
1109    byte[] stopRow = HConstants.EMPTY_END_ROW;
1110    boolean includeStartRow = true;
1111    boolean includeStopRow = false;
1112    if (proto.hasStartRow()) {
1113      startRow = proto.getStartRow().toByteArray();
1114    }
1115    if (proto.hasStopRow()) {
1116      stopRow = proto.getStopRow().toByteArray();
1117    }
1118    if (proto.hasIncludeStartRow()) {
1119      includeStartRow = proto.getIncludeStartRow();
1120    }
1121    if (proto.hasIncludeStopRow()) {
1122      includeStopRow = proto.getIncludeStopRow();
1123    } else {
1124      // old client without this flag, we should consider start=end as a get.
1125      if (ClientUtil.areScanStartRowAndStopRowEqual(startRow, stopRow)) {
1126        includeStopRow = true;
1127      }
1128    }
1129    Scan scan =
1130      new Scan().withStartRow(startRow, includeStartRow).withStopRow(stopRow, includeStopRow);
1131    if (proto.hasCacheBlocks()) {
1132      scan.setCacheBlocks(proto.getCacheBlocks());
1133    }
1134    if (proto.hasMaxVersions()) {
1135      scan.readVersions(proto.getMaxVersions());
1136    }
1137    if (proto.hasStoreLimit()) {
1138      scan.setMaxResultsPerColumnFamily(proto.getStoreLimit());
1139    }
1140    if (proto.hasStoreOffset()) {
1141      scan.setRowOffsetPerColumnFamily(proto.getStoreOffset());
1142    }
1143    if (proto.hasLoadColumnFamiliesOnDemand()) {
1144      scan.setLoadColumnFamiliesOnDemand(proto.getLoadColumnFamiliesOnDemand());
1145    }
1146    if (proto.getCfTimeRangeCount() > 0) {
1147      for (HBaseProtos.ColumnFamilyTimeRange cftr : proto.getCfTimeRangeList()) {
1148        TimeRange timeRange = toTimeRange(cftr.getTimeRange());
1149        scan.setColumnFamilyTimeRange(cftr.getColumnFamily().toByteArray(), timeRange.getMin(),
1150          timeRange.getMax());
1151      }
1152    }
1153    if (proto.hasTimeRange()) {
1154      TimeRange timeRange = toTimeRange(proto.getTimeRange());
1155      scan.setTimeRange(timeRange.getMin(), timeRange.getMax());
1156    }
1157    if (proto.hasFilter()) {
1158      FilterProtos.Filter filter = proto.getFilter();
1159      scan.setFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(filter));
1160    }
1161    if (proto.hasBatchSize()) {
1162      scan.setBatch(proto.getBatchSize());
1163    }
1164    if (proto.hasMaxResultSize()) {
1165      scan.setMaxResultSize(proto.getMaxResultSize());
1166    }
1167    if (proto.hasAllowPartialResults()) {
1168      scan.setAllowPartialResults(proto.getAllowPartialResults());
1169    }
1170    for (NameBytesPair attribute : proto.getAttributeList()) {
1171      scan.setAttribute(attribute.getName(), attribute.getValue().toByteArray());
1172    }
1173    if (proto.getColumnCount() > 0) {
1174      for (Column column : proto.getColumnList()) {
1175        byte[] family = column.getFamily().toByteArray();
1176        if (column.getQualifierCount() > 0) {
1177          for (ByteString qualifier : column.getQualifierList()) {
1178            scan.addColumn(family, qualifier.toByteArray());
1179          }
1180        } else {
1181          scan.addFamily(family);
1182        }
1183      }
1184    }
1185    if (proto.hasReversed()) {
1186      scan.setReversed(proto.getReversed());
1187    }
1188    if (proto.hasConsistency()) {
1189      scan.setConsistency(toConsistency(proto.getConsistency()));
1190    }
1191    if (proto.hasCaching()) {
1192      scan.setCaching(proto.getCaching());
1193    }
1194    if (proto.hasMvccReadPoint()) {
1195      ClientInternalHelper.setMvccReadPoint(scan, proto.getMvccReadPoint());
1196    }
1197    if (proto.hasReadType()) {
1198      scan.setReadType(toReadType(proto.getReadType()));
1199    }
1200    if (proto.getNeedCursorResult()) {
1201      scan.setNeedCursorResult(true);
1202    }
1203    return scan;
1204  }
1205
1206  public static ClientProtos.Cursor toCursor(Cursor cursor) {
1207    ClientProtos.Cursor.Builder builder = ClientProtos.Cursor.newBuilder();
1208    ClientProtos.Cursor.newBuilder().setRow(ByteString.copyFrom(cursor.getRow()));
1209    return builder.build();
1210  }
1211
1212  public static ClientProtos.Cursor toCursor(Cell cell) {
1213    return ClientProtos.Cursor.newBuilder()
1214      .setRow(ByteString.copyFrom(cell.getRowArray(), cell.getRowOffset(), cell.getRowLength()))
1215      .build();
1216  }
1217
1218  public static Cursor toCursor(ClientProtos.Cursor cursor) {
1219    return ClientUtil.createCursor(cursor.getRow().toByteArray());
1220  }
1221
1222  /**
1223   * Create a protocol buffer Get based on a client Get.
1224   * @param get the client Get
1225   * @return a protocol buffer Get
1226   */
1227  public static ClientProtos.Get toGet(final Get get) throws IOException {
1228    ClientProtos.Get.Builder builder = ClientProtos.Get.newBuilder();
1229    builder.setRow(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(get.getRow()));
1230    builder.setCacheBlocks(get.getCacheBlocks());
1231    builder.setMaxVersions(get.getMaxVersions());
1232    if (get.getFilter() != null) {
1233      builder.setFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(get.getFilter()));
1234    }
1235    get.getColumnFamilyTimeRange().forEach((cf, timeRange) -> {
1236      builder.addCfTimeRange(HBaseProtos.ColumnFamilyTimeRange.newBuilder()
1237        .setColumnFamily(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(cf)).setTimeRange(toTimeRange(timeRange))
1238        .build());
1239    });
1240    builder.setTimeRange(ProtobufUtil.toTimeRange(get.getTimeRange()));
1241    Map<String, byte[]> attributes = get.getAttributesMap();
1242    if (!attributes.isEmpty()) {
1243      NameBytesPair.Builder attributeBuilder = NameBytesPair.newBuilder();
1244      for (Map.Entry<String, byte[]> attribute : attributes.entrySet()) {
1245        attributeBuilder.setName(attribute.getKey());
1246        attributeBuilder.setValue(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(attribute.getValue()));
1247        builder.addAttribute(attributeBuilder.build());
1248      }
1249    }
1250    if (get.hasFamilies()) {
1251      Column.Builder columnBuilder = Column.newBuilder();
1252      Map<byte[], NavigableSet<byte[]>> families = get.getFamilyMap();
1253      for (Map.Entry<byte[], NavigableSet<byte[]>> family : families.entrySet()) {
1254        NavigableSet<byte[]> qualifiers = family.getValue();
1255        columnBuilder.setFamily(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(family.getKey()));
1256        columnBuilder.clearQualifier();
1257        if (qualifiers != null && qualifiers.size() > 0) {
1258          for (byte[] qualifier : qualifiers) {
1259            columnBuilder.addQualifier(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(qualifier));
1260          }
1261        }
1262        builder.addColumn(columnBuilder.build());
1263      }
1264    }
1265    if (get.getMaxResultsPerColumnFamily() >= 0) {
1266      builder.setStoreLimit(get.getMaxResultsPerColumnFamily());
1267    }
1268    if (get.getRowOffsetPerColumnFamily() > 0) {
1269      builder.setStoreOffset(get.getRowOffsetPerColumnFamily());
1270    }
1271    if (get.isCheckExistenceOnly()) {
1272      builder.setExistenceOnly(true);
1273    }
1274    if (get.getConsistency() != null && get.getConsistency() != Consistency.STRONG) {
1275      builder.setConsistency(toConsistency(get.getConsistency()));
1276    }
1277
1278    Boolean loadColumnFamiliesOnDemand = get.getLoadColumnFamiliesOnDemandValue();
1279    if (loadColumnFamiliesOnDemand != null) {
1280      builder.setLoadColumnFamiliesOnDemand(loadColumnFamiliesOnDemand);
1281    }
1282    return builder.build();
1283  }
1284
1285  public static MutationProto toMutation(final MutationType type, final Mutation mutation)
1286    throws IOException {
1287    return toMutation(type, mutation, HConstants.NO_NONCE);
1288  }
1289
1290  /**
1291   * Create a protocol buffer Mutate based on a client Mutation
1292   * @return a protobuf'd Mutation
1293   */
1294  public static MutationProto toMutation(final MutationType type, final Mutation mutation,
1295    final long nonce) throws IOException {
1296    return toMutation(type, mutation, MutationProto.newBuilder(), nonce);
1297  }
1298
1299  public static MutationProto toMutation(final MutationType type, final Mutation mutation,
1300    MutationProto.Builder builder) throws IOException {
1301    return toMutation(type, mutation, builder, HConstants.NO_NONCE);
1302  }
1303
1304  public static MutationProto toMutation(final MutationType type, final Mutation mutation,
1305    MutationProto.Builder builder, long nonce) throws IOException {
1306    builder = getMutationBuilderAndSetCommonFields(type, mutation, builder);
1307    if (nonce != HConstants.NO_NONCE) {
1308      builder.setNonce(nonce);
1309    }
1310    if (type == MutationType.INCREMENT) {
1311      builder.setTimeRange(ProtobufUtil.toTimeRange(((Increment) mutation).getTimeRange()));
1312    }
1313    if (type == MutationType.APPEND) {
1314      builder.setTimeRange(ProtobufUtil.toTimeRange(((Append) mutation).getTimeRange()));
1315    }
1316    ColumnValue.Builder columnBuilder = ColumnValue.newBuilder();
1317    QualifierValue.Builder valueBuilder = QualifierValue.newBuilder();
1318    for (Map.Entry<byte[], List<ExtendedCell>> family : ClientInternalHelper
1319      .getExtendedFamilyCellMap(mutation).entrySet()) {
1320      columnBuilder.clear();
1321      columnBuilder.setFamily(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(family.getKey()));
1322      for (ExtendedCell cell : family.getValue()) {
1323        valueBuilder.clear();
1324        valueBuilder.setQualifier(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(cell.getQualifierArray(),
1325          cell.getQualifierOffset(), cell.getQualifierLength()));
1326        valueBuilder.setValue(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(cell.getValueArray(),
1327          cell.getValueOffset(), cell.getValueLength()));
1328        valueBuilder.setTimestamp(cell.getTimestamp());
1329        if (type == MutationType.DELETE || (type == MutationType.PUT && CellUtil.isDelete(cell))) {
1330          KeyValue.Type keyValueType = KeyValue.Type.codeToType(cell.getTypeByte());
1331          valueBuilder.setDeleteType(toDeleteType(keyValueType));
1332        }
1333        columnBuilder.addQualifierValue(valueBuilder.build());
1334      }
1335      builder.addColumnValue(columnBuilder.build());
1336    }
1337    return builder.build();
1338  }
1339
1340  /**
1341   * Create a protocol buffer MutationProto based on a client Mutation. Does NOT include data.
1342   * Understanding is that the Cell will be transported other than via protobuf.
1343   * @return a protobuf'd Mutation
1344   */
1345  public static MutationProto toMutationNoData(final MutationType type, final Mutation mutation,
1346    final MutationProto.Builder builder) throws IOException {
1347    return toMutationNoData(type, mutation, builder, HConstants.NO_NONCE);
1348  }
1349
1350  /**
1351   * Create a protocol buffer MutationProto based on a client Mutation. Does NOT include data.
1352   * Understanding is that the Cell will be transported other than via protobuf.
1353   * @return a protobuf'd Mutation
1354   */
1355  public static MutationProto toMutationNoData(final MutationType type, final Mutation mutation)
1356    throws IOException {
1357    MutationProto.Builder builder = MutationProto.newBuilder();
1358    return toMutationNoData(type, mutation, builder);
1359  }
1360
1361  public static MutationProto toMutationNoData(final MutationType type, final Mutation mutation,
1362    final MutationProto.Builder builder, long nonce) throws IOException {
1363    getMutationBuilderAndSetCommonFields(type, mutation, builder);
1364    builder.setAssociatedCellCount(mutation.size());
1365    if (mutation instanceof Increment) {
1366      builder.setTimeRange(ProtobufUtil.toTimeRange(((Increment) mutation).getTimeRange()));
1367    }
1368    if (mutation instanceof Append) {
1369      builder.setTimeRange(ProtobufUtil.toTimeRange(((Append) mutation).getTimeRange()));
1370    }
1371    if (nonce != HConstants.NO_NONCE) {
1372      builder.setNonce(nonce);
1373    }
1374    return builder.build();
1375  }
1376
1377  /**
1378   * Code shared by {@link #toMutation(MutationType, Mutation)} and
1379   * {@link #toMutationNoData(MutationType, Mutation)}
1380   * @return A partly-filled out protobuf'd Mutation.
1381   */
1382  private static MutationProto.Builder getMutationBuilderAndSetCommonFields(final MutationType type,
1383    final Mutation mutation, MutationProto.Builder builder) {
1384    builder.setRow(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(mutation.getRow()));
1385    builder.setMutateType(type);
1386    builder.setDurability(toDurability(mutation.getDurability()));
1387    builder.setTimestamp(mutation.getTimestamp());
1388    Map<String, byte[]> attributes = mutation.getAttributesMap();
1389    if (!attributes.isEmpty()) {
1390      NameBytesPair.Builder attributeBuilder = NameBytesPair.newBuilder();
1391      for (Map.Entry<String, byte[]> attribute : attributes.entrySet()) {
1392        attributeBuilder.setName(attribute.getKey());
1393        attributeBuilder.setValue(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(attribute.getValue()));
1394        builder.addAttribute(attributeBuilder.build());
1395      }
1396    }
1397    return builder;
1398  }
1399
1400  /**
1401   * Convert a client Result to a protocol buffer Result
1402   * @param result the client Result to convert
1403   * @return the converted protocol buffer Result
1404   */
1405  public static ClientProtos.Result toResult(final Result result) {
1406    return toResult(result, false);
1407  }
1408
1409  /**
1410   * Convert a client Result to a protocol buffer Result
1411   * @param result     the client Result to convert
1412   * @param encodeTags whether to includeTags in converted protobuf result or not When @encodeTags
1413   *                   is set to true, it will return all the tags in the response. These tags may
1414   *                   contain some sensitive data like acl permissions, etc. Only the tools like
1415   *                   Export, Import which needs to take backup needs to set it to true so that
1416   *                   cell tags are persisted in backup. Refer to HBASE-25246 for more context.
1417   * @return the converted protocol buffer Result
1418   */
1419  public static ClientProtos.Result toResult(final Result result, boolean encodeTags) {
1420    if (result.getExists() != null) {
1421      return toResult(result.getExists(), result.isStale());
1422    }
1423
1424    ExtendedCell[] cells = ClientInternalHelper.getExtendedRawCells(result);
1425    if (cells == null || cells.length == 0) {
1426      return result.isStale() ? EMPTY_RESULT_PB_STALE : EMPTY_RESULT_PB;
1427    }
1428
1429    ClientProtos.Result.Builder builder = ClientProtos.Result.newBuilder();
1430    for (ExtendedCell c : cells) {
1431      builder.addCell(toCell(c, encodeTags));
1432    }
1433
1434    builder.setStale(result.isStale());
1435    builder.setPartial(result.mayHaveMoreCellsInRow());
1436
1437    return builder.build();
1438  }
1439
1440  /**
1441   * Convert a client Result to a protocol buffer Result
1442   * @param existence the client existence to send
1443   * @return the converted protocol buffer Result
1444   */
1445  public static ClientProtos.Result toResult(final boolean existence, boolean stale) {
1446    if (stale) {
1447      return existence ? EMPTY_RESULT_PB_EXISTS_TRUE_STALE : EMPTY_RESULT_PB_EXISTS_FALSE_STALE;
1448    } else {
1449      return existence ? EMPTY_RESULT_PB_EXISTS_TRUE : EMPTY_RESULT_PB_EXISTS_FALSE;
1450    }
1451  }
1452
1453  /**
1454   * Convert a client Result to a protocol buffer Result. The pb Result does not include the Cell
1455   * data. That is for transport otherwise.
1456   * @param result the client Result to convert
1457   * @return the converted protocol buffer Result
1458   */
1459  public static ClientProtos.Result toResultNoData(final Result result) {
1460    if (result.getExists() != null) return toResult(result.getExists(), result.isStale());
1461    int size = result.size();
1462    if (size == 0) return result.isStale() ? EMPTY_RESULT_PB_STALE : EMPTY_RESULT_PB;
1463    ClientProtos.Result.Builder builder = ClientProtos.Result.newBuilder();
1464    builder.setAssociatedCellCount(size);
1465    builder.setStale(result.isStale());
1466    return builder.build();
1467  }
1468
1469  /**
1470   * Convert a protocol buffer Result to a client Result
1471   * @param proto the protocol buffer Result to convert
1472   * @return the converted client Result
1473   */
1474  public static Result toResult(final ClientProtos.Result proto) {
1475    return toResult(proto, false);
1476  }
1477
1478  /**
1479   * Convert a protocol buffer Result to a client Result
1480   * @param proto      the protocol buffer Result to convert
1481   * @param decodeTags whether to decode tags into converted client Result When @decodeTags is set
1482   *                   to true, it will decode all the tags from the response. These tags may
1483   *                   contain some sensitive data like acl permissions, etc. Only the tools like
1484   *                   Export, Import which needs to take backup needs to set it to true so that
1485   *                   cell tags are persisted in backup. Refer to HBASE-25246 for more context.
1486   * @return the converted client Result
1487   */
1488  public static Result toResult(final ClientProtos.Result proto, boolean decodeTags) {
1489    if (proto.hasExists()) {
1490      if (proto.getStale()) {
1491        return proto.getExists() ? EMPTY_RESULT_EXISTS_TRUE_STALE : EMPTY_RESULT_EXISTS_FALSE_STALE;
1492      }
1493      return proto.getExists() ? EMPTY_RESULT_EXISTS_TRUE : EMPTY_RESULT_EXISTS_FALSE;
1494    }
1495
1496    List<CellProtos.Cell> values = proto.getCellList();
1497    if (values.isEmpty()) {
1498      return proto.getStale() ? EMPTY_RESULT_STALE : EMPTY_RESULT;
1499    }
1500
1501    List<Cell> cells = new ArrayList<>(values.size());
1502    ExtendedCellBuilder builder = ExtendedCellBuilderFactory.create(CellBuilderType.SHALLOW_COPY);
1503    for (CellProtos.Cell c : values) {
1504      cells.add(toCell(builder, c, decodeTags));
1505    }
1506    return Result.create(cells, null, proto.getStale(), proto.getPartial());
1507  }
1508
1509  /**
1510   * Convert a protocol buffer Result to a client Result
1511   * @param proto   the protocol buffer Result to convert
1512   * @param scanner Optional cell scanner.
1513   * @return the converted client Result
1514   */
1515  public static Result toResult(final ClientProtos.Result proto, final CellScanner scanner)
1516    throws IOException {
1517    List<CellProtos.Cell> values = proto.getCellList();
1518
1519    if (proto.hasExists()) {
1520      if (
1521        (values != null && !values.isEmpty())
1522          || (proto.hasAssociatedCellCount() && proto.getAssociatedCellCount() > 0)
1523      ) {
1524        throw new IllegalArgumentException("bad proto: exists with cells is no allowed " + proto);
1525      }
1526      if (proto.getStale()) {
1527        return proto.getExists() ? EMPTY_RESULT_EXISTS_TRUE_STALE : EMPTY_RESULT_EXISTS_FALSE_STALE;
1528      }
1529      return proto.getExists() ? EMPTY_RESULT_EXISTS_TRUE : EMPTY_RESULT_EXISTS_FALSE;
1530    }
1531
1532    // TODO: Unit test that has some Cells in scanner and some in the proto.
1533    List<Cell> cells = null;
1534    if (proto.hasAssociatedCellCount()) {
1535      int count = proto.getAssociatedCellCount();
1536      cells = new ArrayList<>(count + values.size());
1537      for (int i = 0; i < count; i++) {
1538        if (!scanner.advance()) throw new IOException("Failed get " + i + " of " + count);
1539        cells.add(scanner.current());
1540      }
1541    }
1542
1543    if (!values.isEmpty()) {
1544      if (cells == null) cells = new ArrayList<>(values.size());
1545      ExtendedCellBuilder builder = ExtendedCellBuilderFactory.create(CellBuilderType.SHALLOW_COPY);
1546      for (CellProtos.Cell c : values) {
1547        cells.add(toCell(builder, c, false));
1548      }
1549    }
1550
1551    return (cells == null || cells.isEmpty())
1552      ? (proto.getStale() ? EMPTY_RESULT_STALE : EMPTY_RESULT)
1553      : Result.create(cells, null, proto.getStale());
1554  }
1555
1556  /**
1557   * Convert a ByteArrayComparable to a protocol buffer Comparator
1558   * @param comparator the ByteArrayComparable to convert
1559   * @return the converted protocol buffer Comparator
1560   */
1561  public static ComparatorProtos.Comparator toComparator(ByteArrayComparable comparator) {
1562    ComparatorProtos.Comparator.Builder builder = ComparatorProtos.Comparator.newBuilder();
1563    builder.setName(comparator.getClass().getName());
1564    builder.setSerializedComparator(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(comparator.toByteArray()));
1565    return builder.build();
1566  }
1567
1568  /**
1569   * Convert a protocol buffer Comparator to a ByteArrayComparable
1570   * @param proto the protocol buffer Comparator to convert
1571   * @return the converted ByteArrayComparable
1572   */
1573  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
1574  public static ByteArrayComparable toComparator(ComparatorProtos.Comparator proto)
1575    throws IOException {
1576    String type = proto.getName();
1577    byte[] value = proto.getSerializedComparator().toByteArray();
1578
1579    try {
1580      ByteArrayComparable result = COMPARATORS.getAndCallByName(type, value);
1581      if (result != null) {
1582        return result;
1583      }
1584
1585      if (!ALLOW_FAST_REFLECTION_FALLTHROUGH) {
1586        throw new IllegalStateException("Failed to deserialize comparator " + type
1587          + " because fast reflection returned null and fallthrough is disabled");
1588      }
1589
1590      Class<?> c = Class.forName(type, true, ClassLoaderHolder.CLASS_LOADER);
1591      Method parseFrom = c.getMethod(PARSE_FROM, byte[].class);
1592      if (parseFrom == null) {
1593        throw new IOException("Unable to locate function: " + PARSE_FROM + " in type: " + type);
1594      }
1595      return (ByteArrayComparable) parseFrom.invoke(null, value);
1596    } catch (Exception e) {
1597      throw new IOException(e);
1598    }
1599  }
1600
1601  /**
1602   * Convert a protocol buffer Filter to a client Filter
1603   * @param proto the protocol buffer Filter to convert
1604   * @return the converted Filter
1605   */
1606  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
1607  public static Filter toFilter(FilterProtos.Filter proto) throws IOException {
1608    String type = proto.getName();
1609    final byte[] value = proto.getSerializedFilter().toByteArray();
1610
1611    try {
1612      Filter result = FILTERS.getAndCallByName(type, value);
1613      if (result != null) {
1614        return result;
1615      }
1616
1617      if (!ALLOW_FAST_REFLECTION_FALLTHROUGH) {
1618        throw new IllegalStateException("Failed to deserialize comparator " + type
1619          + " because fast reflection returned null and fallthrough is disabled");
1620      }
1621
1622      Class<?> c = Class.forName(type, true, ClassLoaderHolder.CLASS_LOADER);
1623      Method parseFrom = c.getMethod(PARSE_FROM, byte[].class);
1624      if (parseFrom == null) {
1625        throw new IOException("Unable to locate function: " + PARSE_FROM + " in type: " + type);
1626      }
1627      return (Filter) parseFrom.invoke(c, value);
1628    } catch (Exception e) {
1629      // Either we couldn't instantiate the method object, or "parseFrom" failed.
1630      // In either case, let's not retry.
1631      throw new DoNotRetryIOException(e);
1632    }
1633  }
1634
1635  /**
1636   * Convert a client Filter to a protocol buffer Filter
1637   * @param filter the Filter to convert
1638   * @return the converted protocol buffer Filter
1639   */
1640  public static FilterProtos.Filter toFilter(Filter filter) throws IOException {
1641    FilterProtos.Filter.Builder builder = FilterProtos.Filter.newBuilder();
1642    builder.setName(filter.getClass().getName());
1643    builder.setSerializedFilter(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(filter.toByteArray()));
1644    return builder.build();
1645  }
1646
1647  /**
1648   * Convert a delete KeyValue type to protocol buffer DeleteType.
1649   * @return protocol buffer DeleteType
1650   */
1651  public static DeleteType toDeleteType(KeyValue.Type type) throws IOException {
1652    switch (type) {
1653      case Delete:
1654        return DeleteType.DELETE_ONE_VERSION;
1655      case DeleteColumn:
1656        return DeleteType.DELETE_MULTIPLE_VERSIONS;
1657      case DeleteFamily:
1658        return DeleteType.DELETE_FAMILY;
1659      case DeleteFamilyVersion:
1660        return DeleteType.DELETE_FAMILY_VERSION;
1661      default:
1662        throw new IOException("Unknown delete type: " + type);
1663    }
1664  }
1665
1666  /**
1667   * Convert a protocol buffer DeleteType to delete KeyValue type.
1668   * @param type The DeleteType
1669   * @return The type.
1670   */
1671  public static KeyValue.Type fromDeleteType(DeleteType type) throws IOException {
1672    switch (type) {
1673      case DELETE_ONE_VERSION:
1674        return KeyValue.Type.Delete;
1675      case DELETE_MULTIPLE_VERSIONS:
1676        return KeyValue.Type.DeleteColumn;
1677      case DELETE_FAMILY:
1678        return KeyValue.Type.DeleteFamily;
1679      case DELETE_FAMILY_VERSION:
1680        return KeyValue.Type.DeleteFamilyVersion;
1681      default:
1682        throw new IOException("Unknown delete type: " + type);
1683    }
1684  }
1685
1686  /**
1687   * Convert a stringified protocol buffer exception Parameter to a Java Exception
1688   * @param parameter the protocol buffer Parameter to convert
1689   * @return the converted Exception
1690   * @throws IOException if failed to deserialize the parameter
1691   */
1692  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
1693  public static Throwable toException(final NameBytesPair parameter) throws IOException {
1694    if (parameter == null || !parameter.hasValue()) return null;
1695    String desc = parameter.getValue().toStringUtf8();
1696    String type = parameter.getName();
1697    try {
1698      Class<? extends Throwable> c =
1699        (Class<? extends Throwable>) Class.forName(type, true, ClassLoaderHolder.CLASS_LOADER);
1700      Constructor<? extends Throwable> cn = null;
1701      try {
1702        cn = c.getDeclaredConstructor(String.class);
1703        return cn.newInstance(desc);
1704      } catch (NoSuchMethodException e) {
1705        // Could be a raw RemoteException. See HBASE-8987.
1706        cn = c.getDeclaredConstructor(String.class, String.class);
1707        return cn.newInstance(type, desc);
1708      }
1709    } catch (Exception e) {
1710      throw new IOException(e);
1711    }
1712  }
1713

1715
1716  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
1717  public static <T extends Service> T newServiceStub(Class<T> service, RpcChannel channel)
1718    throws Exception {
1719    return (T) Methods.call(service, null, "newStub", new Class[] { RpcChannel.class },
1720      new Object[] { channel });
1721  }

1726  /**
1727   * A helper to retrieve region info given a region name or an encoded region name using admin
1728   * protocol.
1729   * @return the retrieved region info
1730   */
1731  public static org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.RegionInfo getRegionInfo(
1732    final RpcController controller, final AdminService.BlockingInterface admin,
1733    final byte[] regionName) throws IOException {
1734    try {
1735      GetRegionInfoResponse response =
1736        admin.getRegionInfo(controller, getGetRegionInfoRequest(regionName));
1737      return toRegionInfo(response.getRegionInfo());
1738    } catch (ServiceException se) {
1739      throw getRemoteException(se);
1740    }
1741  }
1742
1743  /** Returns A GetRegionInfoRequest for the passed in regionName. */
1744  public static GetRegionInfoRequest getGetRegionInfoRequest(final byte[] regionName)
1745    throws IOException {
1746    return org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.RegionInfo.isEncodedRegionName(regionName)
1747      ? GetRegionInfoRequest.newBuilder()
1748        .setRegion(RequestConverter.buildRegionSpecifier(RegionSpecifierType.ENCODED_REGION_NAME,
1749          regionName))
1750        .build()
1751      : RequestConverter.buildGetRegionInfoRequest(regionName);
1752  }

1759    throws IOException {

1761      ProtobufUtil.buildCloseRegionRequest(server, regionName);
1762    try {
1763      admin.closeRegion(controller, closeRegionRequest);
1764    } catch (ServiceException se) {
1765      throw getRemoteException(se);
1766    }
1767  }

1840  /**
1841   * Get the list of region info from a GetOnlineRegionResponse
1842   * @param proto the GetOnlineRegionResponse
1843   * @return the list of region info or empty if <code>proto</code> is null
1844   */
1845  public static List<org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.RegionInfo>
1846    getRegionInfos(final GetOnlineRegionResponse proto) {
1847    if (proto == null) return Collections.EMPTY_LIST;
1848    List<org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.RegionInfo> regionInfos =
1849      new ArrayList<>(proto.getRegionInfoList().size());
1850    for (RegionInfo regionInfo : proto.getRegionInfoList()) {
1851      regionInfos.add(toRegionInfo(regionInfo));
1852    }
1853    return regionInfos;
1854  }

1898  /*
1899   * Get the total (read + write) requests from a RegionLoad pb
1900   * @param rl - RegionLoad pb
1901   * @return total (read + write) requests
1902   */
1903  public static long getTotalRequestsCount(RegionLoad rl) {
1904    if (rl == null) {
1905      return 0;
1906    }
1907
1908    return rl.getReadRequestsCount() + rl.getWriteRequestsCount();
1909  }
1910
1911  public static byte[] toDelimitedByteArray(final Message m) throws IOException {
1912    // Allocate arbitrary big size so we avoid resizing.
1913    ByteArrayOutputStream baos = new ByteArrayOutputStream(4096);
1914    baos.write(PB_MAGIC);
1915    m.writeDelimitedTo(baos);
1916    return baos.toByteArray();
1917  }
1918
1919  /**
1920   * Find the HRegion encoded name based on a region specifier
1921   * @param regionSpecifier the region specifier
1922   * @return the corresponding region's encoded name
1923   * @throws DoNotRetryIOException if the specifier type is unsupported
1924   */
1925  public static String getRegionEncodedName(final RegionSpecifier regionSpecifier)
1926    throws DoNotRetryIOException {
1927    ByteString value = regionSpecifier.getValue();
1928    RegionSpecifierType type = regionSpecifier.getType();
1929    switch (type) {
1930      case REGION_NAME:
1931        return org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.RegionInfo.encodeRegionName(value.toByteArray());
1932      case ENCODED_REGION_NAME:
1933        return value.toStringUtf8();
1934      default:
1935        throw new DoNotRetryIOException("Unsupported region specifier type: " + type);
1936    }
1937  }
1938
1939  public static ScanMetrics toScanMetrics(final byte[] bytes) {
1940    MapReduceProtos.ScanMetrics pScanMetrics = null;
1941    try {
1942      pScanMetrics = MapReduceProtos.ScanMetrics.parseFrom(bytes);
1943    } catch (InvalidProtocolBufferException e) {
1944      // Ignored there are just no key values to add.
1945    }
1946    ScanMetrics scanMetrics = new ScanMetrics();
1947    if (pScanMetrics != null) {
1948      for (HBaseProtos.NameInt64Pair pair : pScanMetrics.getMetricsList()) {
1949        if (pair.hasName() && pair.hasValue()) {
1950          scanMetrics.setCounter(pair.getName(), pair.getValue());
1951        }
1952      }
1953    }
1954    return scanMetrics;
1955  }
1956
1957  public static MapReduceProtos.ScanMetrics toScanMetrics(ScanMetrics scanMetrics, boolean reset) {
1958    MapReduceProtos.ScanMetrics.Builder builder = MapReduceProtos.ScanMetrics.newBuilder();
1959    Map<String, Long> metrics = scanMetrics.getMetricsMap(reset);
1960    for (Entry<String, Long> e : metrics.entrySet()) {
1961      HBaseProtos.NameInt64Pair nameInt64Pair =
1962        HBaseProtos.NameInt64Pair.newBuilder().setName(e.getKey()).setValue(e.getValue()).build();
1963      builder.addMetrics(nameInt64Pair);
1964    }
1965    return builder.build();
1966  }
1967
1968  /**
1969   * Unwraps an exception from a protobuf service into the underlying (expected) IOException. This
1970   * method will <strong>always</strong> throw an exception.
1971   * @param se the {@code ServiceException} instance to convert into an {@code IOException}
1972   * @throws NullPointerException if {@code se} is {@code null}
1973   */
1974  public static void toIOException(ServiceException se) throws IOException {
1975    Objects.requireNonNull(se, "Service exception cannot be null");
1976
1977    Throwable cause = se.getCause();
1978    if (cause != null && cause instanceof IOException) {
1979      throw (IOException) cause;
1980    }
1981    throw new IOException(se);
1982  }
1983
1984  public static CellProtos.Cell toCell(final ExtendedCell kv, boolean encodeTags) {
1985    // Doing this is going to kill us if we do it for all data passed.
1986    // St.Ack 20121205
1987    CellProtos.Cell.Builder kvbuilder = CellProtos.Cell.newBuilder();
1988    if (kv instanceof ByteBufferExtendedCell) {
1989      kvbuilder.setRow(wrap(((ByteBufferExtendedCell) kv).getRowByteBuffer(),
1990        ((ByteBufferExtendedCell) kv).getRowPosition(), kv.getRowLength()));
1991      kvbuilder.setFamily(wrap(((ByteBufferExtendedCell) kv).getFamilyByteBuffer(),
1992        ((ByteBufferExtendedCell) kv).getFamilyPosition(), kv.getFamilyLength()));
1993      kvbuilder.setQualifier(wrap(((ByteBufferExtendedCell) kv).getQualifierByteBuffer(),
1994        ((ByteBufferExtendedCell) kv).getQualifierPosition(), kv.getQualifierLength()));
1995      kvbuilder.setCellType(CellProtos.CellType.forNumber(kv.getTypeByte()));
1996      kvbuilder.setTimestamp(kv.getTimestamp());
1997      kvbuilder.setValue(wrap(((ByteBufferExtendedCell) kv).getValueByteBuffer(),
1998        ((ByteBufferExtendedCell) kv).getValuePosition(), kv.getValueLength()));
1999      if (encodeTags) {
2000        kvbuilder.setTags(wrap(((ByteBufferExtendedCell) kv).getTagsByteBuffer(),
2001          ((ByteBufferExtendedCell) kv).getTagsPosition(), kv.getTagsLength()));
2002      }
2003    } else {
2004      kvbuilder.setRow(
2005        UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(kv.getRowArray(), kv.getRowOffset(), kv.getRowLength()));
2006      kvbuilder.setFamily(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(kv.getFamilyArray(), kv.getFamilyOffset(),
2007        kv.getFamilyLength()));
2008      kvbuilder.setQualifier(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(kv.getQualifierArray(),
2009        kv.getQualifierOffset(), kv.getQualifierLength()));
2010      kvbuilder.setCellType(CellProtos.CellType.forNumber(kv.getTypeByte()));
2011      kvbuilder.setTimestamp(kv.getTimestamp());
2012      kvbuilder.setValue(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(kv.getValueArray(), kv.getValueOffset(),
2013        kv.getValueLength()));
2014      if (encodeTags) {
2015        kvbuilder.setTags(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(kv.getTagsArray(), kv.getTagsOffset(),
2016          kv.getTagsLength()));
2017      }
2018    }
2019    return kvbuilder.build();
2020  }
2021
2022  private static ByteString wrap(ByteBuffer b, int offset, int length) {
2023    ByteBuffer dup = b.duplicate();
2024    dup.position(offset);
2025    dup.limit(offset + length);
2026    return UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(dup);
2027  }
2028
2029  public static ExtendedCell toCell(ExtendedCellBuilder cellBuilder, final CellProtos.Cell cell,
2030    boolean decodeTags) {
2031    ExtendedCellBuilder builder = cellBuilder.clear().setRow(cell.getRow().toByteArray())
2032      .setFamily(cell.getFamily().toByteArray()).setQualifier(cell.getQualifier().toByteArray())
2033      .setTimestamp(cell.getTimestamp()).setType((byte) cell.getCellType().getNumber())
2034      .setValue(cell.getValue().toByteArray());
2035    if (decodeTags && cell.hasTags()) {
2036      builder.setTags(cell.getTags().toByteArray());
2037    }
2038    return builder.build();
2039  }

2041  public static HBaseProtos.NamespaceDescriptor toProtoNamespaceDescriptor(NamespaceDescriptor ns) {
2042    HBaseProtos.NamespaceDescriptor.Builder b =
2043      HBaseProtos.NamespaceDescriptor.newBuilder().setName(ByteString.copyFromUtf8(ns.getName()));
2044    for (Map.Entry<String, String> entry : ns.getConfiguration().entrySet()) {
2045      b.addConfiguration(
2046        HBaseProtos.NameStringPair.newBuilder().setName(entry.getKey()).setValue(entry.getValue()));
2047    }
2048    return b.build();
2049  }
2050
2051  public static NamespaceDescriptor toNamespaceDescriptor(HBaseProtos.NamespaceDescriptor desc) {
2052    NamespaceDescriptor.Builder b = NamespaceDescriptor.create(desc.getName().toStringUtf8());
2053    for (HBaseProtos.NameStringPair prop : desc.getConfigurationList()) {
2054      b.addConfiguration(prop.getName(), prop.getValue());
2055    }
2056    return b.build();
2057  }
