2059  public static CompactionDescriptor toCompactionDescriptor(
2060    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.RegionInfo info, byte[] family, List<Path> inputPaths,
2061    List<Path> outputPaths, Path storeDir) {
2062    return toCompactionDescriptor(info, null, family, inputPaths, outputPaths, storeDir);
2063  }
2064
2065  public static CompactionDescriptor toCompactionDescriptor(
2066    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.RegionInfo info, byte[] regionName, byte[] family,
2067    List<Path> inputPaths, List<Path> outputPaths, Path storeDir) {
2068    // compaction descriptor contains relative paths.
2069    // input / output paths are relative to the store dir
2070    // store dir is relative to region dir
2071    CompactionDescriptor.Builder builder = CompactionDescriptor.newBuilder()
2072      .setTableName(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(info.getTable().toBytes()))
2073      .setEncodedRegionName(UnsafeByteOperations
2074        .unsafeWrap(regionName == null ? info.getEncodedNameAsBytes() : regionName))
2075      .setFamilyName(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(family)).setStoreHomeDir(storeDir.getName()); // make
2076                                                                                                   // relative
2077    for (Path inputPath : inputPaths) {
2078      builder.addCompactionInput(inputPath.getName()); // relative path
2079    }
2080    for (Path outputPath : outputPaths) {
2081      builder.addCompactionOutput(outputPath.getName());
2082    }
2083    builder.setRegionName(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(info.getRegionName()));
2084    return builder.build();
2085  }
2086
2087  public static FlushDescriptor toFlushDescriptor(FlushAction action,
2088    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.RegionInfo hri, long flushSeqId,
2089    Map<byte[], List<Path>> committedFiles) {
2090    FlushDescriptor.Builder desc = FlushDescriptor.newBuilder().setAction(action)
2091      .setEncodedRegionName(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(hri.getEncodedNameAsBytes()))
2092      .setRegionName(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(hri.getRegionName()))
2093      .setFlushSequenceNumber(flushSeqId)
2094      .setTableName(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(hri.getTable().getName()));
2095
2096    for (Map.Entry<byte[], List<Path>> entry : committedFiles.entrySet()) {
2097      WALProtos.FlushDescriptor.StoreFlushDescriptor.Builder builder =
2098        WALProtos.FlushDescriptor.StoreFlushDescriptor.newBuilder()
2099          .setFamilyName(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(entry.getKey()))
2100          .setStoreHomeDir(Bytes.toString(entry.getKey())); // relative to region
2101      if (entry.getValue() != null) {
2102        for (Path path : entry.getValue()) {
2103          builder.addFlushOutput(path.getName());
2104        }
2105      }
2106      desc.addStoreFlushes(builder);
2107    }
2108    return desc.build();
2109  }
2110
2111  public static RegionEventDescriptor toRegionEventDescriptor(EventType eventType,
2112    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.RegionInfo hri, long seqId, ServerName server,
2113    Map<byte[], List<Path>> storeFiles) {
2114    final byte[] tableNameAsBytes = hri.getTable().getName();
2115    final byte[] encodedNameAsBytes = hri.getEncodedNameAsBytes();
2116    final byte[] regionNameAsBytes = hri.getRegionName();
2117    return toRegionEventDescriptor(eventType, tableNameAsBytes, encodedNameAsBytes,
2118      regionNameAsBytes, seqId,
2119
2120      server, storeFiles);
2121  }
2122
2123  public static RegionEventDescriptor toRegionEventDescriptor(EventType eventType,
2124    byte[] tableNameAsBytes, byte[] encodedNameAsBytes, byte[] regionNameAsBytes, long seqId,
2125
2126    ServerName server, Map<byte[], List<Path>> storeFiles) {
2127    RegionEventDescriptor.Builder desc = RegionEventDescriptor.newBuilder().setEventType(eventType)
2128      .setTableName(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(tableNameAsBytes))
2129      .setEncodedRegionName(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(encodedNameAsBytes))
2130      .setRegionName(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(regionNameAsBytes)).setLogSequenceNumber(seqId)
2131      .setServer(toServerName(server));
2132
2133    for (Entry<byte[], List<Path>> entry : storeFiles.entrySet()) {
2134      StoreDescriptor.Builder builder =
2135        StoreDescriptor.newBuilder().setFamilyName(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(entry.getKey()))
2136          .setStoreHomeDir(Bytes.toString(entry.getKey()));
2137      for (Path path : entry.getValue()) {
2138        builder.addStoreFile(path.getName());
2139      }
2140
2141      desc.addStores(builder);
2142    }
2143    return desc.build();
2144  }
2145
2146  /**
2147   * Return short version of Message toString'd, shorter than TextFormat#shortDebugString. Tries to
2148   * NOT print out data both because it can be big but also so we do not have data in our logs. Use
2149   * judiciously.
2150   * @return toString of passed <code>m</code>
2151   */
2152  public static String getShortTextFormat(Message m) {
2153    if (m == null) {
2154      return "null";
2155    }
2156    if (m instanceof ScanRequest) {
2157      // This should be small and safe to output. No data.
2158      return TextFormat.shortDebugString(m);
2159    } else if (m instanceof RegionServerReportRequest) {
2160      // Print a short message only, just the servername and the requests, not the full load.
2161      RegionServerReportRequest r = (RegionServerReportRequest) m;
2162      return "server " + TextFormat.shortDebugString(r.getServer()) + " load { numberOfRequests: "
2163        + r.getLoad().getNumberOfRequests() + " }";
2164    } else if (m instanceof RegionServerStartupRequest) {
2165      // Should be small enough.
2166      return TextFormat.shortDebugString(m);
2167    } else if (m instanceof MutationProto) {
2168      return toShortString((MutationProto) m);
2169    } else if (m instanceof GetRequest) {
2170      GetRequest r = (GetRequest) m;
2171      return "region= " + getStringForByteString(r.getRegion().getValue()) + ", row="
2172        + getStringForByteString(r.getGet().getRow());
2173    } else if (m instanceof ClientProtos.MultiRequest) {
2174      ClientProtos.MultiRequest r = (ClientProtos.MultiRequest) m;
2175
2176      // Get the number of Actions
2177      int actionsCount =
2178        r.getRegionActionList().stream().mapToInt(ClientProtos.RegionAction::getActionCount).sum();
2179
2180      // Get first set of Actions.
2181      ClientProtos.RegionAction actions = r.getRegionActionList().get(0);
2182      String row = actions.getActionCount() <= 0
2183        ? ""
2184        : getStringForByteString(actions.getAction(0).hasGet()
2185          ? actions.getAction(0).getGet().getRow()
2186          : actions.getAction(0).getMutation().getRow());
2187      return "region= " + getStringForByteString(actions.getRegion().getValue()) + ", for "
2188        + actionsCount + " action(s) and 1st row key=" + row;
2189    } else if (m instanceof ClientProtos.MutateRequest) {
2190      ClientProtos.MutateRequest r = (ClientProtos.MutateRequest) m;
2191      return "region= " + getStringForByteString(r.getRegion().getValue()) + ", row="
2192        + getStringForByteString(r.getMutation().getRow());
2193    } else if (m instanceof ClientProtos.CoprocessorServiceRequest) {
2194      ClientProtos.CoprocessorServiceRequest r = (ClientProtos.CoprocessorServiceRequest) m;
2195      return "coprocessorService= " + r.getCall().getServiceName() + ":"
2196        + r.getCall().getMethodName();
2197    } else if (m instanceof MasterProtos.MoveRegionRequest) {
2198      return TextFormat.shortDebugString(m);
2199    }
2200    return "TODO: " + m.getClass().toString();
2201  }
2202
2203  private static String getStringForByteString(ByteString bs) {
2204    return Bytes.toStringBinary(bs.toByteArray());
2205  }
2206
2207  /**
2208   * Return SlowLogParams to maintain recent online slowlog responses
2209   * @param message Message object {@link Message}
2210   * @return SlowLogParams with regionName(for filter queries) and params
2211   */
2212  public static SlowLogParams getSlowLogParams(Message message, boolean slowLogScanPayloadEnabled) {
2213    if (message == null) {
2214      return null;
2215    }
2216    if (message instanceof ScanRequest) {
2217      ScanRequest scanRequest = (ScanRequest) message;
2218      String regionName = getStringForByteString(scanRequest.getRegion().getValue());
2219      String params = TextFormat.shortDebugString(message);
2220      if (slowLogScanPayloadEnabled) {
2221        return new SlowLogParams(regionName, params, scanRequest.getScan());
2222      } else {
2223        return new SlowLogParams(regionName, params);
2224      }
2225    } else if (message instanceof MutationProto) {
2226      MutationProto mutationProto = (MutationProto) message;
2227      String params = "type= " + mutationProto.getMutateType().toString() + ", row= "
2228        + getStringForByteString(mutationProto.getRow());
2229      return new SlowLogParams(params);
2230    } else if (message instanceof GetRequest) {
2231      GetRequest getRequest = (GetRequest) message;
2232      String regionName = getStringForByteString(getRequest.getRegion().getValue());
2233      String params =
2234        "region= " + regionName + ", row= " + getStringForByteString(getRequest.getGet().getRow());
2235      return new SlowLogParams(regionName, params);
2236    } else if (message instanceof MultiRequest) {
2237      MultiRequest multiRequest = (MultiRequest) message;
2238      int actionsCount = multiRequest.getRegionActionList().stream()
2239        .mapToInt(ClientProtos.RegionAction::getActionCount).sum();
2240      RegionAction actions = multiRequest.getRegionActionList().get(0);
2241      String regionName = getStringForByteString(actions.getRegion().getValue());
2242      String params = "region= " + regionName + ", for " + actionsCount + " action(s)";
2243      return new SlowLogParams(regionName, params);
2244    } else if (message instanceof MutateRequest) {
2245      MutateRequest mutateRequest = (MutateRequest) message;
2246      String regionName = getStringForByteString(mutateRequest.getRegion().getValue());
2247      String params = "region= " + regionName + ", row= "
2248        + getStringForByteString(mutateRequest.getMutation().getRow());
2249      return new SlowLogParams(regionName, params);
2250    } else if (message instanceof CoprocessorServiceRequest) {
2251      CoprocessorServiceRequest coprocessorServiceRequest = (CoprocessorServiceRequest) message;
2252      String params = "coprocessorService= " + coprocessorServiceRequest.getCall().getServiceName()
2253        + ":" + coprocessorServiceRequest.getCall().getMethodName();
2254      return new SlowLogParams(params);
2255    }
2256    String params = message.getClass().toString();
2257    return new SlowLogParams(params);
2258  }
2259
2260  /**
2261   * Convert a list of NameBytesPair to a more readable CSV
2262   */
2263  public static String convertAttributesToCsv(List<NameBytesPair> attributes) {
2264    if (attributes.isEmpty()) {
2265      return HConstants.EMPTY_STRING;
2266    }
2267    return deserializeAttributes(convertNameBytesPairsToMap(attributes)).entrySet().stream()
2268      .map(entry -> entry.getKey() + " = " + entry.getValue()).collect(Collectors.joining(", "));
2269  }
2270
2271  /**
2272   * Convert a map of byte array attributes to a more readable map of binary string representations
2273   */
2274  public static Map<String, String> deserializeAttributes(Map<String, byte[]> attributes) {
2275    return attributes.entrySet().stream().collect(
2276      Collectors.toMap(Map.Entry::getKey, entry -> Bytes.toStringBinary(entry.getValue())));
2277  }
2278
2279  /**
2280   * Print out some subset of a MutationProto rather than all of it and its data
2281   * @param proto Protobuf to print out
2282   * @return Short String of mutation proto
2283   */
2284  static String toShortString(final MutationProto proto) {
2285    return "row=" + Bytes.toString(proto.getRow().toByteArray()) + ", type="
2286      + proto.getMutateType().toString();
2287  }
2288
2289  public static TableName toTableName(HBaseProtos.TableName tableNamePB) {
2290    return TableName.valueOf(tableNamePB.getNamespace().asReadOnlyByteBuffer(),
2291      tableNamePB.getQualifier().asReadOnlyByteBuffer());
2292  }
2293
2294  public static HBaseProtos.TableName toProtoTableName(TableName tableName) {
2295    return HBaseProtos.TableName.newBuilder()
2296      .setNamespace(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(tableName.getNamespace()))
2297      .setQualifier(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(tableName.getQualifier())).build();
2298  }
2299
2300  public static List<HBaseProtos.TableName> toProtoTableNameList(List<TableName> tableNameList) {
2301    if (tableNameList == null) {
2302      return new ArrayList<>();
2303    }
2304    return tableNameList.stream().map(ProtobufUtil::toProtoTableName).collect(Collectors.toList());
2305  }
2306
2307  public static List<TableName> toTableNameList(List<HBaseProtos.TableName> tableNamesList) {
2308    if (tableNamesList == null) {
2309      return new ArrayList<>();
2310    }
2311    return tableNamesList.stream().map(ProtobufUtil::toTableName).collect(Collectors.toList());
2312  }
2313
2314  public static TableName[] getTableNameArray(List<HBaseProtos.TableName> tableNamesList) {
2315    if (tableNamesList == null) {
2316      return new TableName[0];
2317    }
2318    TableName[] tableNames = new TableName[tableNamesList.size()];
2319    for (int i = 0; i < tableNamesList.size(); i++) {
2320      tableNames[i] = toTableName(tableNamesList.get(i));
2321    }
2322    return tableNames;
2323  }

2327   * @return the converted client CellVisibility
2328   */
2329  public static CellVisibility toCellVisibility(ClientProtos.CellVisibility proto) {
2330    if (proto == null) return null;
2331    return new CellVisibility(proto.getExpression());
2332  }
2333
2334  /**
2335   * Convert a protocol buffer CellVisibility bytes to a client CellVisibility
2336   * @return the converted client CellVisibility
2337   */
2338  public static CellVisibility toCellVisibility(byte[] protoBytes) throws DeserializationException {
2339    if (protoBytes == null) return null;
2340    ClientProtos.CellVisibility.Builder builder = ClientProtos.CellVisibility.newBuilder();
2341    ClientProtos.CellVisibility proto = null;
2342    try {
2343      ProtobufUtil.mergeFrom(builder, protoBytes);
2344      proto = builder.build();
2345    } catch (IOException e) {
2346      throw new DeserializationException(e);
2347    }
2348    return toCellVisibility(proto);
2349  }

2353   * @return a protocol buffer CellVisibility
2354   */
2355  public static ClientProtos.CellVisibility toCellVisibility(CellVisibility cellVisibility) {
2356    ClientProtos.CellVisibility.Builder builder = ClientProtos.CellVisibility.newBuilder();
2357    builder.setExpression(cellVisibility.getExpression());
2358    return builder.build();
2359  }

2382      throw new DeserializationException(e);

2390   */
2391  public static ClientProtos.Authorizations toAuthorizations(Authorizations authorizations) {

2399  /**
2400   * Convert a protocol buffer TimeUnit to a client TimeUnit
2401   * @return the converted client TimeUnit
2402   */
2403  public static TimeUnit toTimeUnit(final HBaseProtos.TimeUnit proto) {
2404    switch (proto) {
2405      case NANOSECONDS:
2406        return TimeUnit.NANOSECONDS;
2407      case MICROSECONDS:
2408        return TimeUnit.MICROSECONDS;
2409      case MILLISECONDS:
2410        return TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS;
2411      case SECONDS:
2412        return TimeUnit.SECONDS;
2413      case MINUTES:
2414        return TimeUnit.MINUTES;
2415      case HOURS:
2416        return TimeUnit.HOURS;
2417      case DAYS:
2418        return TimeUnit.DAYS;
2419    }
2420    throw new RuntimeException("Invalid TimeUnit " + proto);
2421  }
2422

2434        return HBaseProtos.TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS;
2435      case SECONDS:
2436        return HBaseProtos.TimeUnit.SECONDS;
2437      case MINUTES:
2438        return HBaseProtos.TimeUnit.MINUTES;

2602  /**
2603   * Build a protocol buffer TimedQuota
2604   * @param limit    the allowed number of request/data per timeUnit
2605   * @param timeUnit the limit time unit
2606   * @param scope    the quota scope
2607   * @return the protocol buffer TimedQuota
2608   */
2609  public static QuotaProtos.TimedQuota toTimedQuota(final long limit, final TimeUnit timeUnit,
2610    final QuotaScope scope) {
2611    return QuotaProtos.TimedQuota.newBuilder().setSoftLimit(limit)
2612      .setTimeUnit(toProtoTimeUnit(timeUnit)).setScope(toProtoQuotaScope(scope)).build();
2613  }

2615  /**
2616   * Builds a protocol buffer SpaceQuota.
2617   * @param limit           The maximum space usage for the quota in bytes.
2618   * @param violationPolicy The policy to apply when the quota is violated.
2619   * @return The protocol buffer SpaceQuota.
2620   */
2621  public static QuotaProtos.SpaceQuota toProtoSpaceQuota(final long limit,
2622    final SpaceViolationPolicy violationPolicy) {
2623    return QuotaProtos.SpaceQuota.newBuilder().setSoftLimit(limit)
2624      .setViolationPolicy(toProtoViolationPolicy(violationPolicy)).build();
2625  }

2627  /**
2628   * Generates a marker for the WAL so that we propagate the notion of a bulk region load throughout
2629   * the WAL.
2630   * @param tableName         The tableName into which the bulk load is being imported into.
2631   * @param encodedRegionName Encoded region name of the region which is being bulk loaded.
2632   * @param storeFiles        A set of store files of a column family are bulk loaded.
2633   * @param storeFilesSize    Map of store files and their lengths
2634   * @param bulkloadSeqId     sequence ID (by a force flush) used to create bulk load hfile name
2635   * @return The WAL log marker for bulk loads.
2636   */
2637  public static WALProtos.BulkLoadDescriptor toBulkLoadDescriptor(TableName tableName,
2638    ByteString encodedRegionName, Map<byte[], List<Path>> storeFiles,
2639    Map<String, Long> storeFilesSize, long bulkloadSeqId) {
2640    return toBulkLoadDescriptor(tableName, encodedRegionName, storeFiles, storeFilesSize,
2641      bulkloadSeqId, null, true);
2642  }
2643
2644  public static WALProtos.BulkLoadDescriptor toBulkLoadDescriptor(TableName tableName,
2645    ByteString encodedRegionName, Map<byte[], List<Path>> storeFiles,
2646    Map<String, Long> storeFilesSize, long bulkloadSeqId, List<String> clusterIds,
2647    boolean replicate) {
2648    BulkLoadDescriptor.Builder desc =
2649      BulkLoadDescriptor.newBuilder().setTableName(ProtobufUtil.toProtoTableName(tableName))
2650        .setEncodedRegionName(encodedRegionName).setBulkloadSeqNum(bulkloadSeqId)
2651        .setReplicate(replicate);
2652    if (clusterIds != null) {
2653      desc.addAllClusterIds(clusterIds);
2654    }
2655
2656    for (Map.Entry<byte[], List<Path>> entry : storeFiles.entrySet()) {
2657      WALProtos.StoreDescriptor.Builder builder =
2658        StoreDescriptor.newBuilder().setFamilyName(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(entry.getKey()))
2659          .setStoreHomeDir(Bytes.toString(entry.getKey())); // relative to region
2660      for (Path path : entry.getValue()) {
2661        String name = path.getName();
2662        builder.addStoreFile(name);
2663        Long size = storeFilesSize.get(name) == null ? (Long) 0L : storeFilesSize.get(name);
2664        builder.setStoreFileSizeBytes(size);
2665      }
2666      desc.addStores(builder);
2667    }
2668
2669    return desc.build();
2670  }
2671
2672  /**
2673   * This version of protobuf's mergeDelimitedFrom avoid the hard-coded 64MB limit for decoding
2674   * buffers
2675   * @param builder current message builder
2676   * @param in      Inputsream with delimited protobuf data
2677   */
2678  public static void mergeDelimitedFrom(Message.Builder builder, InputStream in)
2679    throws IOException {
2680    // This used to be builder.mergeDelimitedFrom(in);
2681    // but is replaced to allow us to bump the protobuf size limit.
2682    final int firstByte = in.read();
2683    if (firstByte != -1) {
2684      final int size = CodedInputStream.readRawVarint32(firstByte, in);
2685      final InputStream limitedInput = ByteStreams.limit(in, size);
2686      final CodedInputStream codedInput = CodedInputStream.newInstance(limitedInput);
2687      codedInput.setSizeLimit(size);
2688      builder.mergeFrom(codedInput);
2689      codedInput.checkLastTagWas(0);
2690    }
2691  }
2692
2693  /**
2694   * This version of protobuf's mergeFrom avoids the hard-coded 64MB limit for decoding buffers
2695   * where the message size is known
2696   * @param builder current message builder
2697   * @param in      InputStream containing protobuf data
2698   * @param size    known size of protobuf data
2699   */
2700  public static void mergeFrom(Message.Builder builder, InputStream in, int size)
2701    throws IOException {
2702    final CodedInputStream codedInput = CodedInputStream.newInstance(in);
2703    codedInput.setSizeLimit(size);
2704    builder.mergeFrom(codedInput);
2705    codedInput.checkLastTagWas(0);
2706  }
2707
2708  /**
2709   * This version of protobuf's mergeFrom avoids the hard-coded 64MB limit for decoding buffers
2710   * where the message size is not known
2711   * @param builder current message builder
2712   * @param in      InputStream containing protobuf data
2713   */
2714  public static void mergeFrom(Message.Builder builder, InputStream in) throws IOException {
2715    final CodedInputStream codedInput = CodedInputStream.newInstance(in);
2716    codedInput.setSizeLimit(Integer.MAX_VALUE);
2717    builder.mergeFrom(codedInput);
2718    codedInput.checkLastTagWas(0);
2719  }
2720
2721  /**
2722   * This version of protobuf's mergeFrom avoids the hard-coded 64MB limit for decoding buffers when
2723   * working with ByteStrings
2724   * @param builder current message builder
2725   * @param bs      ByteString containing the
2726   */
2727  public static void mergeFrom(Message.Builder builder, ByteString bs) throws IOException {
2728    final CodedInputStream codedInput = bs.newCodedInput();
2729    codedInput.setSizeLimit(bs.size());
2730    builder.mergeFrom(codedInput);
2731    codedInput.checkLastTagWas(0);
2732  }
2733
2734  /**
2735   * This version of protobuf's mergeFrom avoids the hard-coded 64MB limit for decoding buffers when
2736   * working with byte arrays
2737   * @param builder current message builder
2738   * @param b       byte array
2739   */
2740  public static void mergeFrom(Message.Builder builder, byte[] b) throws IOException {
2741    final CodedInputStream codedInput = CodedInputStream.newInstance(b);
2742    codedInput.setSizeLimit(b.length);
2743    builder.mergeFrom(codedInput);
2744    codedInput.checkLastTagWas(0);
2745  }
2746
2747  /**
2748   * This version of protobuf's mergeFrom avoids the hard-coded 64MB limit for decoding buffers when
2749   * working with byte arrays
2750   * @param builder current message builder
2751   * @param b       byte array
2752   */
2753  public static void mergeFrom(Message.Builder builder, byte[] b, int offset, int length)
2754    throws IOException {
2755    final CodedInputStream codedInput = CodedInputStream.newInstance(b, offset, length);
2756    codedInput.setSizeLimit(length);
2757    builder.mergeFrom(codedInput);
2758    codedInput.checkLastTagWas(0);
2759  }
2760
2761  public static void mergeFrom(Message.Builder builder, CodedInputStream codedInput, int length)
2762    throws IOException {
2763    codedInput.resetSizeCounter();
2764    int prevLimit = codedInput.setSizeLimit(length);
2765
2766    int limit = codedInput.pushLimit(length);
2767    builder.mergeFrom(codedInput);
2768    codedInput.popLimit(limit);
2769
2770    codedInput.checkLastTagWas(0);
2771    codedInput.setSizeLimit(prevLimit);
2772  }
2773
2774  public static ReplicationLoadSink
2775    toReplicationLoadSink(ClusterStatusProtos.ReplicationLoadSink rls) {
2776    ReplicationLoadSink.ReplicationLoadSinkBuilder builder = ReplicationLoadSink.newBuilder();
2777    builder.setAgeOfLastAppliedOp(rls.getAgeOfLastAppliedOp())
2778      .setTimestampsOfLastAppliedOp(rls.getTimeStampsOfLastAppliedOp())
2779      .setTimestampStarted(rls.hasTimestampStarted() ? rls.getTimestampStarted() : -1L)
2780      .setTotalOpsProcessed(rls.hasTotalOpsProcessed() ? rls.getTotalOpsProcessed() : -1L);
2781    return builder.build();
2782  }
2783
2784  public static ReplicationLoadSource
2785    toReplicationLoadSource(ClusterStatusProtos.ReplicationLoadSource rls) {
2786    ReplicationLoadSource.ReplicationLoadSourceBuilder builder = ReplicationLoadSource.newBuilder();
2787    builder.setPeerID(rls.getPeerID()).setAgeOfLastShippedOp(rls.getAgeOfLastShippedOp())
2788      .setSizeOfLogQueue(rls.getSizeOfLogQueue())
2789      .setTimestampOfLastShippedOp(rls.getTimeStampOfLastShippedOp())
2790      .setTimeStampOfNextToReplicate(rls.getTimeStampOfNextToReplicate())
2791      .setReplicationLag(rls.getReplicationLag()).setQueueId(rls.getQueueId())
2792      .setRecovered(rls.getRecovered()).setRunning(rls.getRunning())
2793      .setEditsSinceRestart(rls.getEditsSinceRestart()).setEditsRead(rls.getEditsRead())
2794      .setoPsShipped(rls.getOPsShipped());
2795    return builder.build();
2796  }
2797
2798  /**
2799   * Get a protocol buffer VersionInfo
2800   * @return the converted protocol buffer VersionInfo
2801   */
2802  public static HBaseProtos.VersionInfo getVersionInfo() {
2803    HBaseProtos.VersionInfo.Builder builder = HBaseProtos.VersionInfo.newBuilder();
2804    String version = VersionInfo.getVersion();
2805    builder.setVersion(version);
2806    String[] components = version.split("\\.");
2807    if (components != null && components.length > 2) {
2808      builder.setVersionMajor(Integer.parseInt(components[0]));
2809      builder.setVersionMinor(Integer.parseInt(components[1]));
2810    }
2811    builder.setUrl(VersionInfo.getUrl());
2812    builder.setRevision(VersionInfo.getRevision());
2813    builder.setUser(VersionInfo.getUser());
2814    builder.setDate(VersionInfo.getDate());
2815    builder.setSrcChecksum(VersionInfo.getSrcChecksum());
2816    return builder.build();
2817  }
2818
2819  /**
2820   * Convert SecurityCapabilitiesResponse.Capability to SecurityCapability
2821   * @param capabilities capabilities returned in the SecurityCapabilitiesResponse message
2822   * @return the converted list of SecurityCapability elements
2823   */
2824  public static List<SecurityCapability> toSecurityCapabilityList(
2825    List<MasterProtos.SecurityCapabilitiesResponse.Capability> capabilities) {
2826    List<SecurityCapability> scList = new ArrayList<>(capabilities.size());
2827    for (MasterProtos.SecurityCapabilitiesResponse.Capability c : capabilities) {
2828      try {
2829        scList.add(SecurityCapability.valueOf(c.getNumber()));
2830      } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {
2831        // Unknown capability, just ignore it. We don't understand the new capability
2832        // but don't care since by definition we cannot take advantage of it.
2833      }
2834    }
2835    return scList;
2836  }
2837
2838  public static TimeRange toTimeRange(HBaseProtos.TimeRange timeRange) {
2839    if (timeRange == null) {
2840      return TimeRange.allTime();
2841    }
2842    if (timeRange.hasFrom()) {
2843      if (timeRange.hasTo()) {
2844        return TimeRange.between(timeRange.getFrom(), timeRange.getTo());
2845      } else {
2846        return TimeRange.from(timeRange.getFrom());
2847      }
2848    } else {
2849      return TimeRange.until(timeRange.getTo());
2850    }
2851  }
2852
2853  /**
2854   * Converts an ColumnFamilyDescriptor to ColumnFamilySchema
2855   * @param hcd the ColumnFamilySchema
2856   * @return Convert this instance to a the pb column family type
2857   */
2858  public static ColumnFamilySchema toColumnFamilySchema(ColumnFamilyDescriptor hcd) {
2859    ColumnFamilySchema.Builder builder = ColumnFamilySchema.newBuilder();
2860    builder.setName(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(hcd.getName()));
2861    for (Map.Entry<Bytes, Bytes> e : hcd.getValues().entrySet()) {
2862      BytesBytesPair.Builder aBuilder = BytesBytesPair.newBuilder();
2863      aBuilder.setFirst(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(e.getKey().get()));
2864      aBuilder.setSecond(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(e.getValue().get()));
2865      builder.addAttributes(aBuilder.build());
2866    }
2867    for (Map.Entry<String, String> e : hcd.getConfiguration().entrySet()) {
2868      NameStringPair.Builder aBuilder = NameStringPair.newBuilder();
2869      aBuilder.setName(e.getKey());
2870      aBuilder.setValue(e.getValue());
2871      builder.addConfiguration(aBuilder.build());
2872    }
2873    return builder.build();
2874  }
2875
2876  /**
2877   * Converts a ColumnFamilySchema to ColumnFamilyDescriptor
2878   * @param cfs the ColumnFamilySchema
2879   * @return An {@link ColumnFamilyDescriptor} made from the passed in <code>cfs</code>
2880   */
2881  public static ColumnFamilyDescriptor toColumnFamilyDescriptor(final ColumnFamilySchema cfs) {
2882    // Use the empty constructor so we preserve the initial values set on construction for things
2883    // like maxVersion. Otherwise, we pick up wrong values on deserialization which makes for
2884    // unrelated-looking test failures that are hard to trace back to here.
2885    ColumnFamilyDescriptorBuilder builder =
2886      ColumnFamilyDescriptorBuilder.newBuilder(cfs.getName().toByteArray());
2887    cfs.getAttributesList()
2888      .forEach(a -> builder.setValue(a.getFirst().toByteArray(), a.getSecond().toByteArray()));
2889    cfs.getConfigurationList().forEach(a -> builder.setConfiguration(a.getName(), a.getValue()));
2890    return builder.build();
2891  }
2892
2893  /**
2894   * Converts an TableDescriptor to TableSchema
2895   * @param htd the TableDescriptor
2896   * @return Convert the current {@link TableDescriptor} into a pb TableSchema instance.
2897   */
2898  public static TableSchema toTableSchema(TableDescriptor htd) {
2899    TableSchema.Builder builder = TableSchema.newBuilder();
2900    builder.setTableName(toProtoTableName(htd.getTableName()));
2901    for (Map.Entry<Bytes, Bytes> e : htd.getValues().entrySet()) {
2902      BytesBytesPair.Builder aBuilder = BytesBytesPair.newBuilder();
2903      aBuilder.setFirst(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(e.getKey().get()));
2904      aBuilder.setSecond(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(e.getValue().get()));
2905      builder.addAttributes(aBuilder.build());
2906    }
2907    for (ColumnFamilyDescriptor hcd : htd.getColumnFamilies()) {
2908      builder.addColumnFamilies(toColumnFamilySchema(hcd));
2909    }
2910    return builder.build();
2911  }
2912
2913  /**
2914   * Converts a TableSchema to TableDescriptor
2915   * @param ts A pb TableSchema instance.
2916   * @return An {@link TableDescriptor} made from the passed in pb <code>ts</code>.
2917   */
2918  public static TableDescriptor toTableDescriptor(final TableSchema ts) {
2919    TableDescriptorBuilder builder =
2920      TableDescriptorBuilder.newBuilder(ProtobufUtil.toTableName(ts.getTableName()));
2921    ts.getColumnFamiliesList().stream().map(ProtobufUtil::toColumnFamilyDescriptor)
2922      .forEach(builder::setColumnFamily);
2923    ts.getAttributesList()
2924      .forEach(a -> builder.setValue(a.getFirst().toByteArray(), a.getSecond().toByteArray()));
2925    ts.getConfigurationList().forEach(a -> builder.setValue(a.getName(), a.getValue()));
2926    return builder.build();
2927  }

2989
2990  /**
2991   * Convert from {@link SnapshotDescription} to {@link SnapshotProtos.SnapshotDescription}
2992   * @param snapshotDesc the POJO SnapshotDescription
2993   * @return the protobuf SnapshotDescription
2994   */
2995  public static SnapshotProtos.SnapshotDescription
2996    createHBaseProtosSnapshotDesc(SnapshotDescription snapshotDesc) {
2997    SnapshotProtos.SnapshotDescription.Builder builder =
2998      SnapshotProtos.SnapshotDescription.newBuilder();
2999    if (snapshotDesc.getTableName() != null) {
3000      builder.setTable(snapshotDesc.getTableNameAsString());
3001    }
3002    if (snapshotDesc.getName() != null) {
3003      builder.setName(snapshotDesc.getName());
3004    }
3005    if (snapshotDesc.getOwner() != null) {
3006      builder.setOwner(snapshotDesc.getOwner());
3007    }
3008    if (snapshotDesc.getCreationTime() != -1L) {
3009      builder.setCreationTime(snapshotDesc.getCreationTime());
3010    }
3011    if (
3012      snapshotDesc.getTtl() != -1L
3013        && snapshotDesc.getTtl() < TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS.toSeconds(Long.MAX_VALUE)
3014    ) {
3015      builder.setTtl(snapshotDesc.getTtl());
3016    }
3017    if (snapshotDesc.getVersion() != -1) {
3018      builder.setVersion(snapshotDesc.getVersion());
3019    }
3020    if (snapshotDesc.getMaxFileSize() != -1) {
3021      builder.setMaxFileSize(snapshotDesc.getMaxFileSize());
3022    }
3023    builder.setType(ProtobufUtil.createProtosSnapShotDescType(snapshotDesc.getType()));
3024    return builder.build();
3025  }
3026
3027  /**
3028   * Convert from {@link SnapshotProtos.SnapshotDescription} to {@link SnapshotDescription}
3029   * @param snapshotDesc the protobuf SnapshotDescription
3030   * @return the POJO SnapshotDescription
3031   */
3032  public static SnapshotDescription
3033    createSnapshotDesc(SnapshotProtos.SnapshotDescription snapshotDesc) {
3034    final Map<String, Object> snapshotProps = new HashMap<>();
3035    snapshotProps.put("TTL", snapshotDesc.getTtl());
3036    snapshotProps.put(TableDescriptorBuilder.MAX_FILESIZE, snapshotDesc.getMaxFileSize());
3037    return new SnapshotDescription(snapshotDesc.getName(),
3038      snapshotDesc.hasTable() ? TableName.valueOf(snapshotDesc.getTable()) : null,
3039      createSnapshotType(snapshotDesc.getType()), snapshotDesc.getOwner(),
3040      snapshotDesc.getCreationTime(), snapshotDesc.getVersion(), snapshotProps);
3041  }

3045      stats.getCompactionPressure());
3046  }

3057  /**
3058   * Contain ServiceException inside here. Take a callable that is doing our pb rpc and run it.
3059   */
3060  public static <T> T call(Callable<T> callable) throws IOException {
3061    try {
3062      return callable.call();
3063    } catch (Exception e) {
3064      throw ProtobufUtil.handleRemoteException(e);
3065    }
3066  }

3074  public static GetStoreFileRequest buildGetStoreFileRequest(final byte[] regionName,

3078      RequestConverter.buildRegionSpecifier(RegionSpecifierType.REGION_NAME, regionName);

3103  public static CloseRegionRequest buildCloseRegionRequest(ServerName server, byte[] regionName,
3104    ServerName destinationServer, long closeProcId, boolean evictCache,
3105    long initiatingMasterActiveTime) {

3107      getBuilder(server, regionName, destinationServer, closeProcId);

3109    builder.setInitiatingMasterActiveTime(initiatingMasterActiveTime);
3110    return builder.build();

3112
3113  public static CloseRegionRequest.Builder getBuilder(ServerName server, byte[] regionName,
3114    ServerName destinationServer, long closeProcId) {
3115    CloseRegionRequest.Builder builder = CloseRegionRequest.newBuilder();
3116    RegionSpecifier region =
3117      RequestConverter.buildRegionSpecifier(RegionSpecifierType.REGION_NAME, regionName);
3118    builder.setRegion(region);
3119    if (destinationServer != null) {
3120      builder.setDestinationServer(toServerName(destinationServer));
3121    }
3122    if (server != null) {
3123      builder.setServerStartCode(server.getStartcode());
3124    }
3125    builder.setCloseProcId(closeProcId);
3126    return builder;
3127  }

3129  public static ProcedureDescription buildProcedureDescription(String signature, String instance,
3130    Map<String, String> props) {
3131    ProcedureDescription.Builder builder =
3132      ProcedureDescription.newBuilder().setSignature(signature).setInstance(instance);
3133    if (props != null && !props.isEmpty()) {
3134      props.entrySet().forEach(entry -> builder.addConfiguration(
3135        NameStringPair.newBuilder().setName(entry.getKey()).setValue(entry.getValue()).build()));
3136    }
3137    return builder.build();
3138  }
3139
3140  /**
3141   * Get the Meta region state from the passed data bytes. Can handle both old and new style server
3142   * names.
3143   * @param data      protobuf serialized data with meta server name.
3144   * @param replicaId replica ID for this region
3145   * @return RegionState instance corresponding to the serialized data.
3146   * @throws DeserializationException if the data is invalid.
3147   */
3148  public static RegionState parseMetaRegionStateFrom(final byte[] data, int replicaId)
3149    throws DeserializationException {
3150    RegionState.State state = RegionState.State.OPEN;
3151    ServerName serverName;
3152    if (data != null && data.length > 0 && ProtobufUtil.isPBMagicPrefix(data)) {
3153      try {
3154        int prefixLen = ProtobufUtil.lengthOfPBMagic();
3155        ZooKeeperProtos.MetaRegionServer rl = ZooKeeperProtos.MetaRegionServer.parser()
3156          .parseFrom(data, prefixLen, data.length - prefixLen);
3157        if (rl.hasState()) {
3158          state = RegionState.State.convert(rl.getState());
3159        }
3160        HBaseProtos.ServerName sn = rl.getServer();
3161        serverName = ServerName.valueOf(sn.getHostName(), sn.getPort(), sn.getStartCode());
3162      } catch (InvalidProtocolBufferException e) {
3163        throw new DeserializationException("Unable to parse meta region location");
3164      }
3165    } else {
3166      // old style of meta region location?
3167      serverName = parseServerNameFrom(data);
3168    }
3169    if (serverName == null) {
3170      state = RegionState.State.OFFLINE;
3171    }
3172    return new RegionState(
3173      RegionReplicaUtil.getRegionInfoForReplica(RegionInfoBuilder.FIRST_META_REGIONINFO, replicaId),
3174      state, serverName);
3175  }
3176
3177  /**
3178   * Get a ServerName from the passed in data bytes.
3179   * @param data Data with a serialize server name in it; can handle the old style servername where
3180   *             servername was host and port. Works too with data that begins w/ the pb 'PBUF'
3181   *             magic and that is then followed by a protobuf that has a serialized
3182   *             {@link ServerName} in it.
3183   * @return Returns null if <code>data</code> is null else converts passed data to a ServerName
3184   *         instance.
3185   */
3186  public static ServerName parseServerNameFrom(final byte[] data) throws DeserializationException {
3187    if (data == null || data.length <= 0) return null;
3188    if (ProtobufMagic.isPBMagicPrefix(data)) {
3189      int prefixLen = ProtobufMagic.lengthOfPBMagic();
3190      try {
3191        ZooKeeperProtos.Master rss =
3192          ZooKeeperProtos.Master.parser().parseFrom(data, prefixLen, data.length - prefixLen);
3193        org.apache.hadoop.hbase.shaded.protobuf.generated.HBaseProtos.ServerName sn =
3194          rss.getMaster();
3195        return ServerName.valueOf(sn.getHostName(), sn.getPort(), sn.getStartCode());
3196      } catch (/* InvalidProtocolBufferException */IOException e) {
3197        // A failed parse of the znode is pretty catastrophic. Rather than loop
3198        // retrying hoping the bad bytes will changes, and rather than change
3199        // the signature on this method to add an IOE which will send ripples all
3200        // over the code base, throw a RuntimeException. This should "never" happen.
3201        // Fail fast if it does.
3202        throw new DeserializationException(e);
3203      }
3204    }
3205    // The str returned could be old style -- pre hbase-1502 -- which was
3206    // hostname and port seperated by a colon rather than hostname, port and
3207    // startcode delimited by a ','.
3208    String str = Bytes.toString(data);
3209    int index = str.indexOf(ServerName.SERVERNAME_SEPARATOR);
3210    if (index != -1) {
3211      // Presume its ServerName serialized with versioned bytes.
3212      return ServerName.parseVersionedServerName(data);
3213    }
3214    // Presume it a hostname:port format.
3215    String hostname = Addressing.parseHostname(str);
3216    int port = Addressing.parsePort(str);
3217    return ServerName.valueOf(hostname, port, -1L);
3218  }
3219
3220  /**
3221   * Helper to convert the protobuf Procedure to JSON String
3222   * @return Convert the current Protocol Buffers Procedure to JSON String
3223   */
3224  public static String toProcedureJson(List<ProcedureProtos.Procedure> procProtos) {
3225    JsonArray procJsons = new JsonArray(procProtos.size());
3226    for (ProcedureProtos.Procedure procProto : procProtos) {
3227      try {
3228        JsonElement procJson = ProtobufMessageConverter.toJsonElement(procProto);
3229        procJsons.add(procJson);
3230      } catch (InvalidProtocolBufferException e) {
3231        procJsons.add(e.toString());
3232      }
3233    }
3234    return procJsons.toString();
3235  }
3236
3237  public static String toLockJson(List<LockServiceProtos.LockedResource> lockedResourceProtos) {
3238    JsonArray lockedResourceJsons = new JsonArray(lockedResourceProtos.size());
3239    for (LockServiceProtos.LockedResource lockedResourceProto : lockedResourceProtos) {
3240      try {
3241        JsonElement lockedResourceJson =
3242          ProtobufMessageConverter.toJsonElement(lockedResourceProto);
3243        lockedResourceJsons.add(lockedResourceJson);
3244      } catch (InvalidProtocolBufferException e) {
3245        lockedResourceJsons.add(e.toString());
3246      }
3247    }
3248    return lockedResourceJsons.toString();
3249  }
3250
3251  /**
3252   * Convert a RegionInfo to a Proto RegionInfo
3253   * @param info the RegionInfo to convert
3254   * @return the converted Proto RegionInfo
3255   */
3256  public static HBaseProtos.RegionInfo
3257    toRegionInfo(final org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.RegionInfo info) {
3258    if (info == null) {
3259      return null;
3260    }
3261    HBaseProtos.RegionInfo.Builder builder = HBaseProtos.RegionInfo.newBuilder();
3262    builder.setTableName(ProtobufUtil.toProtoTableName(info.getTable()));
3263    builder.setRegionId(info.getRegionId());
3264    if (info.getStartKey() != null) {
3265      builder.setStartKey(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(info.getStartKey()));
3266    }
3267    if (info.getEndKey() != null) {
3268      builder.setEndKey(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(info.getEndKey()));
3269    }
3270    builder.setOffline(info.isOffline());
3271    builder.setSplit(info.isSplit());
3272    builder.setReplicaId(info.getReplicaId());
3273    return builder.build();
3274  }
3275
3276  /**
3277   * Convert HBaseProto.RegionInfo to a RegionInfo
3278   * @param proto the RegionInfo to convert
3279   * @return the converted RegionInfo
3280   */
3281  public static org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.RegionInfo
3282    toRegionInfo(final HBaseProtos.RegionInfo proto) {
3283    if (proto == null) {
3284      return null;
3285    }
3286    TableName tableName = ProtobufUtil.toTableName(proto.getTableName());
3287    long regionId = proto.getRegionId();
3288    int defaultReplicaId = org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.RegionInfo.DEFAULT_REPLICA_ID;
3289    int replicaId = proto.hasReplicaId() ? proto.getReplicaId() : defaultReplicaId;
3290    if (tableName.equals(TableName.META_TABLE_NAME) && replicaId == defaultReplicaId) {
3291      return RegionInfoBuilder.FIRST_META_REGIONINFO;
3292    }
3293    byte[] startKey = null;
3294    byte[] endKey = null;
3295    if (proto.hasStartKey()) {
3296      startKey = proto.getStartKey().toByteArray();
3297    }
3298    if (proto.hasEndKey()) {
3299      endKey = proto.getEndKey().toByteArray();
3300    }
3301    boolean split = false;
3302    if (proto.hasSplit()) {
3303      split = proto.getSplit();
3304    }
3305    RegionInfoBuilder rib = RegionInfoBuilder.newBuilder(tableName).setStartKey(startKey)
3306      .setEndKey(endKey).setRegionId(regionId).setReplicaId(replicaId).setSplit(split);
3307    if (proto.hasOffline()) {
3308      rib.setOffline(proto.getOffline());
3309    }
3310    return rib.build();
3311  }
3312
3313  public static HBaseProtos.RegionLocation toRegionLocation(HRegionLocation loc) {
3314    HBaseProtos.RegionLocation.Builder builder = HBaseProtos.RegionLocation.newBuilder();
3315    builder.setRegionInfo(toRegionInfo(loc.getRegion()));
3316    if (loc.getServerName() != null) {
3317      builder.setServerName(toServerName(loc.getServerName()));
3318    }
3319    builder.setSeqNum(loc.getSeqNum());
3320    return builder.build();
3321  }
3322
3323  public static HRegionLocation toRegionLocation(HBaseProtos.RegionLocation proto) {
3324    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.RegionInfo regionInfo = toRegionInfo(proto.getRegionInfo());
3325    ServerName serverName = proto.hasServerName() ? toServerName(proto.getServerName()) : null;
3326    return new HRegionLocation(regionInfo, serverName, proto.getSeqNum());
3327  }

3329  public static List<SnapshotDescription>

3333      .collect(Collectors.toList());

3335
3336  public static CacheEvictionStats toCacheEvictionStats(HBaseProtos.CacheEvictionStats stats)
3337    throws IOException {
3338    CacheEvictionStatsBuilder builder = CacheEvictionStats.builder();
3339    builder.withEvictedBlocks(stats.getEvictedBlocks()).withMaxCacheSize(stats.getMaxCacheSize());
3340    if (stats.getExceptionCount() > 0) {
3341      for (HBaseProtos.RegionExceptionMessage exception : stats.getExceptionList()) {
3342        HBaseProtos.RegionSpecifier rs = exception.getRegion();
3343        byte[] regionName = rs.getValue().toByteArray();
3344        builder.addException(regionName, ProtobufUtil.toException(exception.getException()));
3345      }
3346    }
3347    return builder.build();
3348  }
3349
3350  public static HBaseProtos.CacheEvictionStats
3351    toCacheEvictionStats(CacheEvictionStats cacheEvictionStats) {
3352    HBaseProtos.CacheEvictionStats.Builder builder = HBaseProtos.CacheEvictionStats.newBuilder();
3353    for (Map.Entry<byte[], Throwable> entry : cacheEvictionStats.getExceptions().entrySet()) {
3354      builder.addException(RegionExceptionMessage.newBuilder()
3355        .setRegion(
3356          RequestConverter.buildRegionSpecifier(RegionSpecifierType.REGION_NAME, entry.getKey()))
3357        .setException(ResponseConverter.buildException(entry.getValue())).build());
3358    }
3359    return builder.setEvictedBlocks(cacheEvictionStats.getEvictedBlocks())
3360      .setMaxCacheSize(cacheEvictionStats.getMaxCacheSize()).build();
3361  }

3364    toReplicationLoadSource(ReplicationLoadSource rls) {
3365    return ClusterStatusProtos.ReplicationLoadSource.newBuilder().setPeerID(rls.getPeerID())
3366      .setAgeOfLastShippedOp(rls.getAgeOfLastShippedOp())
3367      .setSizeOfLogQueue((int) rls.getSizeOfLogQueue())
3368      .setTimeStampOfLastShippedOp(rls.getTimestampOfLastShippedOp())
3369      .setReplicationLag(rls.getReplicationLag()).setQueueId(rls.getQueueId())
3370      .setRecovered(rls.isRecovered()).setRunning(rls.isRunning())
3371      .setEditsSinceRestart(rls.hasEditsSinceRestart())
3372      .setTimeStampOfNextToReplicate(rls.getTimeStampOfNextToReplicate())
3373      .setOPsShipped(rls.getOPsShipped()).setEditsRead(rls.getEditsRead()).build();
3374  }

3385  public static HBaseProtos.TimeRange toTimeRange(TimeRange timeRange) {
3386    if (timeRange == null) {
3387      timeRange = TimeRange.allTime();
3388    }
3389    return HBaseProtos.TimeRange.newBuilder().setFrom(timeRange.getMin()).setTo(timeRange.getMax())
3390      .build();
3391  }
3392
3393  public static byte[] toCompactionEventTrackerBytes(Set<String> storeFiles) {
3394    HFileProtos.CompactionEventTracker.Builder builder =
3395      HFileProtos.CompactionEventTracker.newBuilder();
3396    storeFiles.forEach(sf -> builder.addCompactedStoreFile(ByteString.copyFromUtf8(sf)));
3397    return ProtobufUtil.prependPBMagic(builder.build().toByteArray());
3398  }
3399
3400  public static Set<String> toCompactedStoreFiles(byte[] bytes) throws IOException {
3401    if (bytes != null && ProtobufUtil.isPBMagicPrefix(bytes)) {
3402      int pbLen = ProtobufUtil.lengthOfPBMagic();
3403      HFileProtos.CompactionEventTracker.Builder builder =
3404        HFileProtos.CompactionEventTracker.newBuilder();
3405      ProtobufUtil.mergeFrom(builder, bytes, pbLen, bytes.length - pbLen);
3406      HFileProtos.CompactionEventTracker compactionEventTracker = builder.build();
3407      List<ByteString> compactedStoreFiles = compactionEventTracker.getCompactedStoreFileList();
3408      if (compactedStoreFiles != null && compactedStoreFiles.size() != 0) {
3409        return compactedStoreFiles.stream().map(ByteString::toStringUtf8)
3410          .collect(Collectors.toSet());
3411      }
3412    }
3413    return Collections.emptySet();
3414  }

3416  public static ClusterStatusProtos.RegionStatesCount
3417    toTableRegionStatesCount(RegionStatesCount regionStatesCount) {
3418    int openRegions = 0;
3419    int splitRegions = 0;
3420    int closedRegions = 0;
3421    int regionsInTransition = 0;
3422    int totalRegions = 0;
3423    if (regionStatesCount != null) {
3424      openRegions = regionStatesCount.getOpenRegions();
3425      splitRegions = regionStatesCount.getSplitRegions();
3426      closedRegions = regionStatesCount.getClosedRegions();
3427      regionsInTransition = regionStatesCount.getRegionsInTransition();
3428      totalRegions = regionStatesCount.getTotalRegions();
3429    }
3430    return ClusterStatusProtos.RegionStatesCount.newBuilder().setOpenRegions(openRegions)
3431      .setSplitRegions(splitRegions).setClosedRegions(closedRegions)
3432      .setRegionsInTransition(regionsInTransition).setTotalRegions(totalRegions).build();
3433  }
3434
3435  public static RegionStatesCount
3436    toTableRegionStatesCount(ClusterStatusProtos.RegionStatesCount regionStatesCount) {
3437    int openRegions = 0;
3438    int splitRegions = 0;
3439    int closedRegions = 0;
3440    int regionsInTransition = 0;
3441    int totalRegions = 0;
3442    if (regionStatesCount != null) {
3443      closedRegions = regionStatesCount.getClosedRegions();
3444      regionsInTransition = regionStatesCount.getRegionsInTransition();
3445      openRegions = regionStatesCount.getOpenRegions();
3446      splitRegions = regionStatesCount.getSplitRegions();
3447      totalRegions = regionStatesCount.getTotalRegions();
3448    }
3449    return new RegionStatesCount.RegionStatesCountBuilder().setOpenRegions(openRegions)
3450      .setSplitRegions(splitRegions).setClosedRegions(closedRegions)
3451      .setRegionsInTransition(regionsInTransition).setTotalRegions(totalRegions).build();
3452  }
3453
3454  /**
3455   * Convert Protobuf class
3456   * {@link org.apache.hadoop.hbase.shaded.protobuf.generated.TooSlowLog.SlowLogPayload} To client
3457   * SlowLog Payload class {@link OnlineLogRecord}
3458   * @param slowLogPayload SlowLog Payload protobuf instance
3459   * @return SlowLog Payload for client usecase
3460   */
3461  private static LogEntry getSlowLogRecord(final TooSlowLog.SlowLogPayload slowLogPayload) {
3462    OnlineLogRecord.OnlineLogRecordBuilder onlineLogRecord =
3463      new OnlineLogRecord.OnlineLogRecordBuilder().setCallDetails(slowLogPayload.getCallDetails())
3464        .setClientAddress(slowLogPayload.getClientAddress())
3465        .setMethodName(slowLogPayload.getMethodName())
3466        .setMultiGetsCount(slowLogPayload.getMultiGets())
3467        .setMultiMutationsCount(slowLogPayload.getMultiMutations())
3468        .setMultiServiceCalls(slowLogPayload.getMultiServiceCalls())
3469        .setParam(slowLogPayload.getParam()).setProcessingTime(slowLogPayload.getProcessingTime())
3470        .setQueueTime(slowLogPayload.getQueueTime()).setRegionName(slowLogPayload.getRegionName())
3471        .setResponseSize(slowLogPayload.getResponseSize())
3472        .setBlockBytesScanned(slowLogPayload.getBlockBytesScanned())
3473        .setFsReadTime(slowLogPayload.getFsReadTime())
3474        .setServerClass(slowLogPayload.getServerClass()).setStartTime(slowLogPayload.getStartTime())
3475        .setUserName(slowLogPayload.getUserName())
3476        .setRequestAttributes(convertNameBytesPairsToMap(slowLogPayload.getRequestAttributeList()))
3477        .setConnectionAttributes(
3478          convertNameBytesPairsToMap(slowLogPayload.getConnectionAttributeList()));
3479    if (slowLogPayload.hasScan()) {
3480      try {
3481        onlineLogRecord.setScan(ProtobufUtil.toScan(slowLogPayload.getScan()));
3482      } catch (Exception e) {
3483        LOG.warn("Failed to convert Scan proto {}", slowLogPayload.getScan(), e);
3484      }
3485    }
3486    return onlineLogRecord.build();
3487  }
3488
3489  private static Map<String, byte[]>
3490    convertNameBytesPairsToMap(List<NameBytesPair> nameBytesPairs) {
3491    return nameBytesPairs.stream().collect(Collectors.toMap(NameBytesPair::getName,
3492      nameBytesPair -> nameBytesPair.getValue().toByteArray()));
3493  }
3494
3495  /**
3496   * Convert AdminProtos#SlowLogResponses to list of {@link OnlineLogRecord}
3497   * @param logEntry slowlog response protobuf instance
3498   * @return list of SlowLog payloads for client usecase
3499   */
3500  public static List<LogEntry> toSlowLogPayloads(final HBaseProtos.LogEntry logEntry) {
3501    try {
3502      final String logClassName = logEntry.getLogClassName();
3503      Class<?> logClass = Class.forName(logClassName).asSubclass(Message.class);
3504      Method method = logClass.getMethod("parseFrom", ByteString.class);
3505      if (logClassName.contains("SlowLogResponses")) {
3506        AdminProtos.SlowLogResponses slowLogResponses =
3507          (AdminProtos.SlowLogResponses) method.invoke(null, logEntry.getLogMessage());
3508        return slowLogResponses.getSlowLogPayloadsList().stream()
3509          .map(ProtobufUtil::getSlowLogRecord).collect(Collectors.toList());
3510      }
3511    } catch (ClassNotFoundException | NoSuchMethodException | IllegalAccessException
3512      | InvocationTargetException e) {
3513      throw new RuntimeException("Error while retrieving response from server");
3514    }
3515    throw new RuntimeException("Invalid response from server");
3516  }

3519   * Convert {@link ClearSlowLogResponses} to boolean
3520   * @param clearSlowLogResponses Clear slowlog response protobuf instance
3521   * @return boolean representing clear slowlog response
3522   */
3523  public static boolean toClearSlowLogPayload(final ClearSlowLogResponses clearSlowLogResponses) {
3524    return clearSlowLogResponses.getIsCleaned();
3525  }

3552
3553  public static RSGroupInfo toGroupInfo(RSGroupProtos.RSGroupInfo proto) {
3554    RSGroupInfo rsGroupInfo = new RSGroupInfo(proto.getName());
3555
3556    Collection<Address> addresses = proto.getServersList().parallelStream()
3557      .map(serverName -> Address.fromParts(serverName.getHostName(), serverName.getPort()))
3558      .collect(Collectors.toList());
3559    rsGroupInfo.addAllServers(addresses);
3560
3561    Collection<TableName> tables = proto.getTablesList().parallelStream()
3562      .map(ProtobufUtil::toTableName).collect(Collectors.toList());
3563    rsGroupInfo.addAllTables(tables);
3564
3565    proto.getConfigurationList()
3566      .forEach(pair -> rsGroupInfo.setConfiguration(pair.getName(), pair.getValue()));
3567    return rsGroupInfo;
3568  }
3569
3570  public static RSGroupProtos.RSGroupInfo toProtoGroupInfo(RSGroupInfo pojo) {
3571    List<HBaseProtos.TableName> tables = new ArrayList<>(pojo.getTables().size());
3572    for (TableName arg : pojo.getTables()) {
3573      tables.add(ProtobufUtil.toProtoTableName(arg));
3574    }
3575    List<HBaseProtos.ServerName> hostports = new ArrayList<>(pojo.getServers().size());
3576    for (Address el : pojo.getServers()) {
3577      hostports.add(HBaseProtos.ServerName.newBuilder().setHostName(el.getHostname())
3578        .setPort(el.getPort()).build());
3579    }
3580    List<
3581      NameStringPair> configuration =
3582        pojo
3583          .getConfiguration().entrySet().stream().map(entry -> NameStringPair.newBuilder()
3584            .setName(entry.getKey()).setValue(entry.getValue()).build())
3585          .collect(Collectors.toList());
3586    return RSGroupProtos.RSGroupInfo.newBuilder().setName(pojo.getName()).addAllServers(hostports)
3587      .addAllTables(tables).addAllConfiguration(configuration).build();
3588  }
3589
3590  public static CheckAndMutate toCheckAndMutate(ClientProtos.Condition condition,
3591    MutationProto mutation, CellScanner cellScanner) throws IOException {
3592    byte[] row = condition.getRow().toByteArray();
3593    CheckAndMutate.Builder builder = CheckAndMutate.newBuilder(row);
3594    Filter filter = condition.hasFilter() ? ProtobufUtil.toFilter(condition.getFilter()) : null;
3595    if (filter != null) {
3596      builder.ifMatches(filter);
3597    } else {
3598      builder.ifMatches(condition.getFamily().toByteArray(), condition.getQualifier().toByteArray(),
3599        CompareOperator.valueOf(condition.getCompareType().name()),
3600        ProtobufUtil.toComparator(condition.getComparator()).getValue());
3601    }
3602    TimeRange timeRange = condition.hasTimeRange()
3603      ? ProtobufUtil.toTimeRange(condition.getTimeRange())
3604      : TimeRange.allTime();
3605    builder.timeRange(timeRange);
3606
3607    try {
3608      MutationType type = mutation.getMutateType();
3609      switch (type) {
3610        case PUT:
3611          return builder.build(ProtobufUtil.toPut(mutation, cellScanner));
3612        case DELETE:
3613          return builder.build(ProtobufUtil.toDelete(mutation, cellScanner));
3614        case INCREMENT:
3615          return builder.build(ProtobufUtil.toIncrement(mutation, cellScanner));
3616        case APPEND:
3617          return builder.build(ProtobufUtil.toAppend(mutation, cellScanner));
3618        default:
3619          throw new DoNotRetryIOException("Unsupported mutate type: " + type.name());
3620      }
3621    } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {
3622      throw new DoNotRetryIOException(e.getMessage());
3623    }
3624  }
3625
3626  public static CheckAndMutate toCheckAndMutate(ClientProtos.Condition condition,
3627    List<Mutation> mutations) throws IOException {
3628    assert mutations.size() > 0;
3629    byte[] row = condition.getRow().toByteArray();
3630    CheckAndMutate.Builder builder = CheckAndMutate.newBuilder(row);
3631    Filter filter = condition.hasFilter() ? ProtobufUtil.toFilter(condition.getFilter()) : null;
3632    if (filter != null) {
3633      builder.ifMatches(filter);
3634    } else {
3635      builder.ifMatches(condition.getFamily().toByteArray(), condition.getQualifier().toByteArray(),
3636        CompareOperator.valueOf(condition.getCompareType().name()),
3637        ProtobufUtil.toComparator(condition.getComparator()).getValue());
3638    }
3639    TimeRange timeRange = condition.hasTimeRange()
3640      ? ProtobufUtil.toTimeRange(condition.getTimeRange())
3641      : TimeRange.allTime();
3642    builder.timeRange(timeRange);
3643
3644    try {
3645      if (mutations.size() == 1) {
3646        Mutation m = mutations.get(0);
3647        if (m instanceof Put) {
3648          return builder.build((Put) m);
3649        } else if (m instanceof Delete) {
3650          return builder.build((Delete) m);
3651        } else if (m instanceof Increment) {
3652          return builder.build((Increment) m);
3653        } else if (m instanceof Append) {
3654          return builder.build((Append) m);
3655        } else {
3656          throw new DoNotRetryIOException(
3657            "Unsupported mutate type: " + m.getClass().getSimpleName().toUpperCase());
3658        }
3659      } else {
3660        return builder.build(new RowMutations(mutations.get(0).getRow()).add(mutations));
3661      }
3662    } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {
3663      throw new DoNotRetryIOException(e.getMessage());
3664    }
3665  }
3666
3667  public static ClientProtos.Condition toCondition(final byte[] row, final byte[] family,
3668    final byte[] qualifier, final CompareOperator op, final byte[] value, final Filter filter,
3669    final TimeRange timeRange) throws IOException {
3670
3671    ClientProtos.Condition.Builder builder =
3672      ClientProtos.Condition.newBuilder().setRow(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(row));
3673
3674    if (filter != null) {
3675      builder.setFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(filter));
3676    } else {
3677      builder.setFamily(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(family))
3678        .setQualifier(UnsafeByteOperations
3679          .unsafeWrap(qualifier == null ? HConstants.EMPTY_BYTE_ARRAY : qualifier))
3680        .setComparator(ProtobufUtil.toComparator(new BinaryComparator(value)))
3681        .setCompareType(HBaseProtos.CompareType.valueOf(op.name()));
3682    }
3683
3684    return builder.setTimeRange(ProtobufUtil.toTimeRange(timeRange)).build();
3685  }
3686
3687  public static ClientProtos.Condition toCondition(final byte[] row, final Filter filter,
3688    final TimeRange timeRange) throws IOException {
3689    return toCondition(row, null, null, null, null, filter, timeRange);
3690  }
3691
3692  public static ClientProtos.Condition toCondition(final byte[] row, final byte[] family,
3693    final byte[] qualifier, final CompareOperator op, final byte[] value, final TimeRange timeRange)
3694    throws IOException {
3695    return toCondition(row, family, qualifier, op, value, null, timeRange);
3696  }

3698  public static List<LogEntry> toBalancerDecisionResponse(HBaseProtos.LogEntry logEntry) {
3699    try {
3700      final String logClassName = logEntry.getLogClassName();
3701      Class<?> logClass = Class.forName(logClassName).asSubclass(Message.class);
3702      Method method = logClass.getMethod("parseFrom", ByteString.class);
3703      if (logClassName.contains("BalancerDecisionsResponse")) {
3704        MasterProtos.BalancerDecisionsResponse response =
3705          (MasterProtos.BalancerDecisionsResponse) method.invoke(null, logEntry.getLogMessage());
3706        return getBalancerDecisionEntries(response);
3707      }
3708    } catch (ClassNotFoundException | NoSuchMethodException | IllegalAccessException
3709      | InvocationTargetException e) {
3710      throw new RuntimeException("Error while retrieving response from server");
3711    }

3732  public static List<LogEntry>
3733    getBalancerDecisionEntries(MasterProtos.BalancerDecisionsResponse response) {
3734    List<RecentLogs.BalancerDecision> balancerDecisions = response.getBalancerDecisionList();
3735    if (CollectionUtils.isEmpty(balancerDecisions)) {
3736      return Collections.emptyList();
3737    }
3738    return balancerDecisions.stream()
3739      .map(balancerDecision -> new BalancerDecision.Builder()
3740        .setInitTotalCost(balancerDecision.getInitTotalCost())
3741        .setInitialFunctionCosts(balancerDecision.getInitialFunctionCosts())
3742        .setComputedTotalCost(balancerDecision.getComputedTotalCost())
3743        .setFinalFunctionCosts(balancerDecision.getFinalFunctionCosts())
3744        .setComputedSteps(balancerDecision.getComputedSteps())
3745        .setRegionPlans(balancerDecision.getRegionPlansList()).build())
3746      .collect(Collectors.toList());
3747  }
3748
3749  public static List<LogEntry>
3750    getBalancerRejectionEntries(MasterProtos.BalancerRejectionsResponse response) {
3751    List<RecentLogs.BalancerRejection> balancerRejections = response.getBalancerRejectionList();
3752    if (CollectionUtils.isEmpty(balancerRejections)) {
3753      return Collections.emptyList();
3754    }
3755    return balancerRejections.stream()
3756      .map(balancerRejection -> new BalancerRejection.Builder()
3757        .setReason(balancerRejection.getReason())
3758        .setCostFuncInfoList(balancerRejection.getCostFuncInfoList()).build())
3759      .collect(Collectors.toList());
3760  }

3814  /**
3815   * Check whether this IPBE indicates EOF or not.
3816   * <p/>
3817   * We will check the exception message, if it is likely the one of
3818   * InvalidProtocolBufferException.truncatedMessage, we will consider it as EOF, otherwise not.
3819   */
3820  public static boolean isEOF(InvalidProtocolBufferException e) {
3821    return e.getMessage().contains("input has been truncated");
3822  }
3823
3824  /**
3825   * This is a wrapper of the PB message's parseDelimitedFrom. The difference is, if we can not
3826   * determine whether there are enough bytes in stream, i.e, the available method does not have a
3827   * valid return value, we will try to read all the bytes to a byte array first, and then parse the
3828   * pb message with {@link Parser#parseFrom(byte[])} instead of call
3829   * {@link Parser#parseDelimitedFrom(InputStream)} directly. This is because even if the bytes are
3830   * not enough bytes, {@link Parser#parseDelimitedFrom(InputStream)} could still return without any
3831   * errors but just leave us a partial PB message.
3832   * @return The PB message if we can parse it successfully, otherwise there will always be an
3833   *         exception thrown, will never return {@code null}.
3834   */
3835  public static <T extends Message> T parseDelimitedFrom(InputStream in, Parser<T> parser)
3836    throws IOException {
3837    int firstByte = in.read();
3838    if (firstByte < 0) {
3839      throw new EOFException("EOF while reading message size");
3840    }
3841    int size = CodedInputStream.readRawVarint32(firstByte, in);
3842    int available = in.available();
3843    if (available > 0) {
3844      if (available < size) {
3845        throw new EOFException("Available bytes not enough for parsing PB message, expect at least "
3846          + size + " bytes, but only " + available + " bytes available");
3847      }
3848      // this piece of code is copied from GeneratedMessageV3.parseFrom
3849      try {
3850        return parser.parseFrom(ByteStreams.limit(in, size));
3851      } catch (InvalidProtocolBufferException e) {
3852        throw e.unwrapIOException();
3853      }
3854    } else {
3855      // this usually means the stream does not have a proper available implementation, let's read
3856      // the content to an byte array before parsing.
3857      byte[] bytes = new byte[size];
3858      ByteStreams.readFully(in, bytes);
3859      return parser.parseFrom(bytes);
3860    }
3861  }
3862}
